When complete, click Complete. valid_associated_activity_logs.name: HMS Phone Screen
valid_associated_activity_logs.extra_log_types:
# @library grit enabled_if
# @library grit ps_forms_eligibility
# @library grit eligibility

_definitions:

  # Rule for editable_if only
  # Lock the forms on finalization
  not_finalized: &not_finalized
    not_any:
      activity_log__grit_assignment_phone_screens:
        extra_log_type: finalize


  ####
  # Boilerplace for notifying roles
  # Override the subject: and if: structures to refine operation
  ####

  # Default email - just add roles or users
  notify_email_default: &notify_email_default
    type: email

    layout_template: grit notification layout
    content_template: grit notification message
    extra_substitutions:
      reason: ''
      extra_text: |
        The GRIT Study participant has completed the HMS phone screen.
      panel_tab: activity-log--grit-assignment-phone-screens
    subject: "GRIT Study: HMS Phone Screen Complete"


  # Default SMS - just add roles or users
  notify_sms_default: &notify_sms_default
    type: sms
    layout_template: standard sms layout
    content_template: grit sms notification
    subject: "HMS Phone Screen Complete"



  # Notify MSM phone screener
  notify_ps_complete: &notify_ps_complete
    <<: *notify_email_default
    role: email - msm phone screener

  # MedNav reviewer SMS
  notify_ps_complete_sms: &notify_ps_complete_sms
    <<: *notify_sms_default
    role: sms - msm phone screener

  # PI
  notify_pi: &notify_pi
    <<: *notify_email_default
    role: email - pi follow up


  # PI SMS
  notify_pi_sms: &notify_pi_sms
    <<: *notify_sms_default
    role: sms - pi follow up


  continue_after_audit_c: &continue_after_audit_c
    any_after_audit_c:
      <<: *eligible_audit_c
      all_possibly_eligible: &possibly_eligible_audit_c
        dynamic_model__grit_ps_audit_c_questions:
          possibly_eligible_yes_no: 'yes'

  continue_after_pain_questions: &continue_after_pain_questions
    any_after_pain_questions:
      <<: *eligible_pain_questions
      all_possibly_eligible: &possibly_eligible_pain_questions
        dynamic_model__grit_ps_pain_questions:
          possibly_eligible_yes_no: 'yes'

  continue_after_participations: &continue_after_participations
    any_after_participations:
      <<: *eligible_participation
      all_possibly_eligible: &possibly_eligible_participation
        dynamic_model__grit_ps_participations:
          possibly_eligible_yes_no: 'yes'


  all_eligible: &all_eligible
    all_eligible: &all_eligible_items
      <<: *eligible_pain_questions
      <<: *eligible_audit_c
      <<: *eligible_participation

  all_eligible_and_complete: &all_eligible_and_complete
    all_eligible_and_complete:
      <<: *all_eligible_items
      all_has_eligible_done:
        activity_log__grit_assignment_phone_screens:
          extra_log_type: eligible

  not_any_possibly_eligible: &not_any_possibly_eligible
    not_any_possibly_eligible: &possibly_eligible_items
      any_possibly_1:
          <<: *possibly_eligible_pain_questions
      any_possibly_2:
          <<: *possibly_eligible_audit_c
      any_possibly_3:
          <<: *possibly_eligible_participation

  all_show_eligible: &all_show_eligible
    all_show_eligible:
      all:
        activity_log__grit_assignment_phone_screens:
          extra_log_type: participation
      <<: *all_eligible_items


  any_possibly_eligible_no: &any_possibly_eligible_no
    any_possibly_eligible_no:
      all_basic:
        <<: *ineligible_pain_questions
        any_no:
          dynamic_model__grit_ps_pain_questions:
            possibly_eligible_yes_no: 'no'
#        all_audit_c:
#          <<: *ineligible_audit_c
#          not_any_no:
#           dynamic_model__grit_ps_audit_c_questions:
#             possibly_eligible_yes_no: 'no'
        all_participation:
          <<: *ineligible_participation
          not_any_no:
           dynamic_model__grit_ps_participations:
             possibly_eligible_yes_no: 'no'



_default:
  <<: *access_defaults
  editable_if: *not_finalized

  save_action:
    on_create: create_next_creatable


################################################
start_phone_screen:
  label: Start Phone Screening
  fields:

  references:
    dynamic_model__grit_ps_initial_screening:
      from: this
      add: one_to_this

  caption_before:
    submit: If the subject is ready to continue, save this form and continue with the next form.
  view_options:
    show_embedded_at_top: true

  creatable_if:
    <<: *enabled_if
    not_any:
      dynamic_model__grit_ps_initial_screenings:
        select_still_interested: "yes"


  save_action:
    on_create:
      create_next_creatable:
        if:
          all:
            dynamic_model__grit_ps_initial_screenings:
              still_interested_2_yes_no: "yes"
              id:
                this_references: id
      show_panel:
        value: activity_log__grit_assignments
        if:
          not_all:
            dynamic_model__grit_ps_initial_screenings:
              select_still_interested: "yes"
              still_interested_2_yes_no: "yes"
              id:
                this_references: id

  showable_if:
    always: true

  save_trigger:
    on_create:

      create_reference:

        ###### Create tracker entry with exit (no consent) record ######
        ###### Not ineligible, but also not eligible and consented ######
        - activity_log__grit_assignment:
            if:
              all:
                dynamic_model__grit_ps_initial_screenings:
                  id:
                    this_references: id
                this:
                  any:
                    dynamic_model__grit_ps_initial_screenings:
                      select_is_good_time_to_speak: 'not interested'
                      select_still_interested: 'no'
                      still_interested_2_yes_no: 'no'

            in: master
            with:
              extra_log_type: exit_ps


        - activity_log__grit_assignment:
            if:
              all:
                dynamic_model__grit_ps_initial_screenings:
                  id:
                    this_references: id
                this:
                  any:
                    dynamic_model__grit_ps_initial_screenings:
                      select_is_good_time_to_speak:
                        - left voicemail
                        - not appropriate time
                      select_still_interested: 'yes - call back'

            in: master
            with:
              extra_log_type: schedule_screening
              select_who: current_user_email
              follow_up_when:
                dynamic_model__grit_ps_initial_screenings:
                  id:
                    this_references: id
                  follow_up_date: return_value
              follow_up_time:
                dynamic_model__grit_ps_initial_screenings:
                  id:
                    this_references: id
                  follow_up_time: return_value
              notes: |
                Call went to voicemail, or participant requested to speak another time

              select_record_from_player_contacts:
                activity_log__grit_assignments:
                  extra_log_type: schedule_screening
                  select_record_from_player_contacts: return_value



################################################
audit_c:
  label: Audit-C

  references:
    dynamic_model__grit_ps_audit_c_question:
      from: this
      add: one_to_this


  creatable_if:
    <<: *enabled_if
    all:
      activity_log__grit_assignment_phone_screens:
        extra_log_type: start_phone_screen
      dynamic_model__grit_ps_initial_screenings:
        still_interested_2_yes_no: 'yes'

    not_any:
      activity_log__grit_assignment_phone_screens:
        extra_log_type: audit_c



################################################
pain_questions:
  label: Pain Inquiry

  references:
    dynamic_model__grit_ps_pain_question:
      from: this
      add: one_to_this

  creatable_if:
    <<: *enabled_if

    all:
      activity_log__grit_assignment_phone_screens:
        extra_log_type: audit_c
#      <<: *continue_after_audit_c

    not_any:
      activity_log__grit_assignment_phone_screens:
        extra_log_type: pain_questions

################################################
participation:
  label: Ability to Participate
  
  references:
    dynamic_model__grit_ps_participation:
      from: this
      add: one_to_this
      
  creatable_if:
    <<: *enabled_if

    all:
      activity_log__grit_assignment_phone_screens:
        extra_log_type: pain_questions
      <<: *continue_after_pain_questions

    not_any:
      activity_log__grit_assignment_phone_screens:
        extra_log_type: participation
      # If Audit C was ineligible, just skip this and move on to ineligible
      dynamic_model__grit_ps_audit_c_questions:
        possibly_eligible_yes_no: 'no'


################################################
ineligible:
  label: Ineligible

  view_options:
    hide_unless_creatable: true

  references:
    dynamic_model__grit_ps_non_eligible:
      from: this
      add: one_to_this

  showable_if:
    always: true


  creatable_if:
    all:
      <<: *enabled_if
      not_any:
        activity_log__grit_assignment_phone_screens:
          extra_log_type: ineligible
      not_all_show_eligible:
        <<: *all_show_eligible
        <<: *not_any_possibly_eligible

      any_responses_ineligible: &any_responses_ineligible
        <<: *any_possibly_eligible_no


        all_audit_c:
          activity_log__grit_assignment_phone_screens:
            extra_log_type: audit_c
          not_any:
            <<: *eligible_audit_c
          not_any_2:
            <<: *possibly_eligible_audit_c

        all_pain_questions:
          activity_log__grit_assignment_phone_screens:
            extra_log_type: pain_questions
          not_any:
            <<: *eligible_pain_questions
          not_any_2:
            <<: *possibly_eligible_pain_questions


        all_participation:
          activity_log__grit_assignment_phone_screens:
            extra_log_type: participation
          not_any:
            <<: *eligible_participation
          not_any_2:
            <<: *possibly_eligible_participation



  save_trigger:
    on_create:
      create_reference:

        ##### Screener Responses with outcome default #####
        - dynamic_model__grit_ps_screener_response:
            in: master
            with:
              outcome: ineligible

         ###### Create tracker entry with screener responses ######
#        - activity_log__grit_assignment_phone_screen:
#            in: master
#            with:
#              extra_log_type: screener_responses

        ##### Record consent in tracker since requested follow up and gave consent #####
        - activity_log__grit_assignment:
            in: master
            if:
              any_gave_consent_to_share_ineligible:
                dynamic_model__grit_ps_non_eligibles:
                  consent_to_pass_info_to_msm_yes_no: 'yes'
                  consent_to_pass_info_to_msm_2_yes_no: 'yes'

            with:
              extra_log_type: consent_to_share_details
              activity_date: now()
              select_activity: Verbal consent during HMS Phone Screen
              select_who: current_user_email



        ##### Ineligible - requested PI follow up ######
        - activity_log__grit_assignment_followup: &create_ref_request_pi_followup
            in: this
            add: many
            if:
              all:
                any:
                  dynamic_model__grit_ps_non_eligibles:
                    contact_pi_yes_no: 'yes'
                <<: *gave_consent_to_share

            with:
              extra_log_type: request_pi_followup
              notes: |
                HMS Phone Screen found this subject to be ineligible.
                The subject requested a PI follow up.

                Please review the HMS Phone Screen tab for complete information.



################################################
possibly_eligible:
  label: Possibly Eligible

  references:
    dynamic_model__grit_ps_possibly_eligibles:
      from: this
      add: one_to_this

  showable_if:
    always: true

  creatable_if:
    all:
      <<: *enabled_if

      all_done:
        activity_log__grit_assignment_phone_screens:
          extra_log_type: participation

      not_any:
        activity_log__grit_assignment_phone_screens:
          extra_log_type: possibly_eligible

      any_possible_eligible:
        <<: *possibly_eligible_items

      not_any_show_eligible:
        <<: *all_show_eligible

      not_any_ineligible:
        <<: *any_responses_ineligible

#      not_:
#        <<: *any_possibly_eligible_no

      any_continue_after_possibly_eligible:

        all_audit_c:
          activity_log__grit_assignment_phone_screens:
            extra_log_type: audit_c
          <<: *continue_after_audit_c

        all_pain_questions:
          activity_log__grit_assignment_phone_screens:
            extra_log_type: pain_questions
          <<: *continue_after_pain_questions

        all_participation_questions:
          activity_log__grit_assignment_phone_screens:
            extra_log_type: participations
          <<: *continue_after_participations


  caption_before:
    submit: |
      *Save this form after the call, then complete the **Screener Reponses**.
      When that form has been created the PI will be informed that a
      follow up is required.*

  view_options:
    hide_unless_creatable: true

  save_trigger:
    on_create:
      create_reference:

        ##### Screener Responses with outcome default #####
        - dynamic_model__grit_ps_screener_response:
            in: master
            with:
              outcome: possibly_eligible
            if:
              any_consented_possibly_eligible: &consented_possibly_eligible
                activity_log__grit_assignment_phone_screens:
                  extra_log_type: possibly_eligible
      #          dynamic_model__grit_ps_possibly_eligibles:
      #            consent_to_pass_info_to_msm_yes_no: 'yes'
      #            consent_to_pass_info_to_msm_2_yes_no: 'yes'

#        - dynamic_model__grit_ps_screener_response:
#            in: master
#            with:
#              outcome: possibly eligible - no consent
#            if:
#              all:
#                dynamic_model__grit_ps_possibly_eligibles:
#                  consent_to_pass_info_to_msm_yes_no: 'no'
#                  consent_to_pass_info_to_msm_2_yes_no: 'no'





################################################
eligible:
  label: Eligible

  showable_if:
    always: true

  references:
    dynamic_model__grit_ps_eligible:
      from: this
      add: one_to_this

  creatable_if:
    all:
      <<: *enabled_if
      <<: *all_show_eligible

      not_any:
        activity_log__grit_assignment_phone_screens:
          extra_log_type: eligible

  view_options:
    hide_unless_creatable: true

  save_trigger:
    on_create:
      create_reference:

        ##### Screener Responses with outcome default #####
        dynamic_model__grit_ps_screener_response:
          in: master
          with:
            outcome: eligible



################################################
screener_responses:
  label: Screener Responses

  view_options:
    hide_unless_creatable: true

  references:
    dynamic_model__grit_ps_screener_response:
      from: this
      add: one_to_this


  creatable_if:
    all:
      <<: *enabled_if
      any_eligible_possibly:
        all_eligible:
          activity_log__grit_assignment_phone_screens:
            extra_log_type: eligible
        any: *consented_possibly_eligible            

      not_any:
        activity_log__grit_assignment_phone_screens:
          extra_log_type: screener_responses

  save_trigger:
    on_create:

      create_reference:

        ##### Record consent in tracker since requested follow up and gave consent #####
        - activity_log__grit_assignment: &create_ref_record_consent
            in: master
            if:
              <<: *gave_and_understood_consent
            with:
              extra_log_type: consent_to_share_details
              activity_date: now()
              select_activity: Verbal consent during HMS Phone Screen
              select_who: current_user_email


        ##### Possibly eligible - requested PI review ######
        - activity_log__grit_assignment_followup:
            in: this
            add: many
            if: &all_request_possibly_eligible_pi_review
              all:
                any:
                  dynamic_model__grit_ps_screener_responses:
                    outcome: possibly_eligible
                <<: *gave_and_understood_consent

            with:
              extra_log_type: request_pi_ps_review
              notes: |
                HMS Phone Screen found this subject to be possibly eligible.

                A review is required before eligibility for MSM screening can be finalized.

                Please review the HMS Phone Screen tab for complete information.
                At least one of the screener blocks will have a header prompt:

                > **NOTE TO PI**
                >
                > The screener marked this form as Possibly Eligible

                Additional notes will be provided by the screening interviewer.



################################################
subject_contact:
  label: Contact Participant

  references:
    dynamic_model__grit_ps_subject_contacts:
      from: this
      add: one_to_this

  creatable_if:
    all:
      <<: *enabled_if
      <<: *not_finalized
      <<: *all_request_possibly_eligible_pi_review
      not_all_eligibility_followup_done:
        activity_log__grit_assignment_phone_screens:
          extra_log_type: eligibility_followup


  view_options:
    hide_unless_creatable: true

  save_action:


################################################
eligibility_followup:
  label: Eligibility Follow Up

  references:
    dynamic_model__grit_ps_eligibility_followups:
      from: this
      add: one_to_this

  showable_if:
    always: true

  creatable_if:
    all:
      <<: *enabled_if
      <<: *not_finalized
      <<: *all_request_possibly_eligible_pi_review
      not_any:
        activity_log__grit_assignment_phone_screens:
          extra_log_type: eligibility_followup

  view_options:
    hide_unless_creatable: true

  save_trigger:

    on_create:
      create_reference:
        ##### Record consent to share details if the participant gave it
        - activity_log__grit_assignment: *create_ref_record_consent
        ##### Ineligible - requested PI follow up ######
        - activity_log__grit_assignment_followup:
            <<: *create_ref_request_pi_followup
            if:
              all:
                all_ineligible_and_contact_pi:
                  dynamic_model__grit_ps_eligibility_followups:
                    outcome: 'ineligible'
                    contact_pi_yes_no: 'yes'
                <<: *gave_consent_to_share




################################################
finalize:
  label: Finalize Entries

  view_options:
    hide_unless_creatable: true
    show_cancel: true

  caption_before:
    all_fields: |
      When finalized the phone screen forms are locked from editing.

      If the subject is eligible and has consented
      to passing information to MSM,
      the MSM team will be notified automatically that the second phone screener is
      ready to be performed.

      Otherwise the MSM team will not be notified.


    submit: |
      Click the cancel button instead if review or
      revision of the phone screen forms is still required.


  creatable_if:
    all:
      <<: *enabled_if

      any_next:
        # If ineligible, or eligible and screener responses completed
        any_ineligible_eligible_with_screener:
          dynamic_model__grit_ps_screener_responses:
            outcome:
              - ineligible
              - eligible
              - possibly eligible - no consent

          dynamic_model__grit_ps_eligibility_followups:
            outcome:
              - ineligible
              - eligible

      not_any:
        activity_log__grit_assignment_phone_screens:
          extra_log_type: finalize


  # Override the default that hides activities after a certain stage,
  # so that any user can see that the phone screen process has been completed
  showable_if:
    always: true


  save_action:
    on_create:
      show_panel:
        value: activity_log__grit_assignments
      hide_panel:
        value: activity_log__grit_assignment_phone_screens

  save_trigger:
    on_create:
      create_reference:



        ###### Create tracker entry with ineligible record ######
        - activity_log__grit_assignment:
            if:
              <<: *any_ineligible
            in: master
            with:
              extra_log_type: ineligible


        ###### Create tracker entry with exit (no consent) record ######
        ###### Not ineligible, but also not eligible and consented ######
        - activity_log__grit_assignment:
            if:
              not_any:
                <<: *any_ineligible
                <<: *all_eligible_and_gave_consent
            in: master
            with:
              extra_log_type: exit_ps


        ###### Create tracker entry with HMS Eligible record ######
        - activity_log__grit_assignment:
            if:
              <<: *all_eligible_and_gave_consent
            in: master
            with:
              extra_log_type: hms_ps_eligible




test_condition:
  label: Test Condition
  creatable_if:
      <<: *all_eligible_and_gave_consent

Click the link below to view the adverse event record and complete the review. panel_tab: activity-log--grit-assignment-adverse-events subject: "GRIT Study: Adverse Event needs initial review" - type: sms role: sms - dynamic_model__grit_adverse_event: from: this add: one_to_this # The initial review can be performed at any time until the PI review has been completed # It does not block PI review - activity_log__grit_assignment_adverse_event: label: Initial Review from: this add: one_to_this add_with: extra_log_type: initial_review filter_by: extra_log_type: initial_review creatable_if: all: activity_log__grit_assignment_adverse_events: extra_log_type: adverse_event_record id: this: id not_all: activity_log__grit_assignment_adverse_events: extra_log_type: pi_review id: this_references: id # The PI review can be performed at any time until the event is reported to the IRB # It is not blocked by initial review and can happen in place of it # The rules around which type of events need PI review still stand, but are not enforced # here, since the PI may select to just handle the items before initial review has classified them - nfs_store__manage__container: <<: *ref_nfs_store__manage__container # Initial review will be performed by a qualified person, such as an on-site RN, or an assigned person remotely # This activity does not block the PI review initial_review: fields: - select_who - done_when - notes label: Completed Initial Review caption_before: all_fields: Review the Event and update the details and severity if necessary before continuing. select_who: Who performed this review(if recording this action for somebody else)? done_when: When was this task performed? notes: Record any notes related to the review. If necessary, files may be uploaded below to provide additional supporting information. submit: Review the Adverse Event and update the details and severity if necessary. When complete, click Complete. If the incident is internal or serious, and unexpected and related / possibly related the PI will be notified. save_action: label: Complete showable_if: never: true creatable_if: never: true save_trigger: on_create: notify: - type: email role: email - adverse event pi layout_template: grit notification layout content_template: grit notification message extra_substitutions: reason: '' extra_text: | A participant has an adverse event recorded that needs review. Click the link below to view the adverse event record and complete the review. panel_tab: activity-log--grit-assignment-adverse-events subject: "GRIT Study: Adverse Event needs review" if: ¬ify_conditions_pi any: all: dynamic_model__grit_adverse_events: select_location: internal select_expectedness: unexpected select_relatedness: - related - possibly related id: parent_references: id all2: dynamic_model__grit_adverse_events: select_severity: serious select_expectedness: unexpected select_relatedness: - related - possibly related id: parent_references: id - type: sms role: sms - adverse event pi layout_template: standard sms layout content_template: grit sms notification subject: Adverse Event Review Required if: *notify_conditions_pi pi_review: label: Complete PI Review fields: - select_who - done_when - notes caption_before: all_fields: Review the Event and update the details and severity if necessary before continuing. select_who: Who performed this review (if recording this action for somebody else)? done_when: When was this task performed? notes: Record any notes related to the review. If necessary, files may be uploaded below to provide additional supporting information. submit: Review the Adverse Event. When complete, click Complete. If the incident is internal or serious, and unexpected and related / possibly related, a staff member will be notified and will complete the report for the IRB. save_action: label: Complete showable_if: never: true creatable_if: never: true save_trigger: on_create: notify: - type: email role: email - adverse event irb report layout_template: grit notification layout content_template: grit notification message extra_substitutions: reason: '' extra_text: | A participant has an adverse event recorded that needs IRB reporting. Click the link below to view the adverse event record and complete the reporting process. panel_tab: activity-log--grit-assignment-adverse-events subject: "GRIT Study: Adverse Event needs IRB report" if: ¬ify_conditions_irb_report any: all: dynamic_model__grit_adverse_events: select_location: internal select_expectedness: unexpected select_relatedness: - related - possibly related id: parent_references: id all2: dynamic_model__grit_adverse_events: select_severity: serious select_expectedness: unexpected select_relatedness: - related - possibly related id: parent_references: id - type: sms role: sms - adverse event irb report layout_template: standard sms layout content_template: grit sms notification subject: Adverse Event if: *notify_conditions_irb_report report_to_irb: label: Completed Report to IRB fields: - select_who - done_when - notes caption_before: select_who: Who performed this task (if recording this action for somebody else)? done_when: When was this task performed? notes: Record any notes related to the review. If necessary, files may be uploaded below to provide additional supporting information. submit: When the internal or serious, and unexpected and related / possibly related Adverse Event has been reported to the IRB, click Complete. save_action: label: Complete showable_if: never: true creatable_if: never: true

valid_associated_activity_logs.name: Follow Ups
valid_associated_activity_logs.extra_log_types:
# @library grit enabled_if
# @library grit filestore_container


_definitions:


######################
# Notification Setup
######################

  notify_email_default: &notify_email_default
    type: email
    
    layout_template: grit notification layout
    content_template: grit notification message
    extra_substitutions:
      reason: ''
      extra_text: |
        The GRIT Study participant requires a follow up from the PI.
        
        Click the link below to review the follow up request.
        
      panel_tab: activity-log--grit-assignment-med-navs      
    subject: "GRIT Study: Participant Follow Up Required"


  # Default SMS - just add roles or users
  notify_sms_default: &notify_sms_default
    type: sms
    layout_template: standard sms layout
    content_template: grit sms notification
    subject: "GRIT Study Participant Follow Up Required"


  # PI
  notify_pi: &notify_pi
    <<: *notify_email_default
    role: email - pi follow up


  # PI SMS
  notify_pi_sms: &notify_pi_sms
    <<: *notify_sms_default
    role: sms - pi follow up


######################

  followup_fields: &followup_fields
    - activity_date
    - select_direction
    - select_contact
    - select_result
    - select_next_step
    - follow_up_when
    - follow_up_time
    - notes


  communication_fields: &communication_fields
    - select_activity
    - activity_date
    - select_contact
    - select_direction
    - select_result
    - select_next_step
    - follow_up_when
    - follow_up_time

  communication_show_if: &communication_show_if
    select_result:
      not_any:
        select_activity:
          - schedule follow up
          - completed
    select_next_step:
      any:
        select_result: follow up
        select_activity: schedule follow up
    follow_up_when:
      any:
        select_result: follow up
        select_activity: schedule follow up
    follow_up_time:
      any:
        select_result: follow up
        select_activity: schedule follow up
    select_direction:
      not_any:
        select_activity:
          - schedule follow up
          - completed
    select_contact:
      not_any:
        select_activity:
          - completed
          
        select_direction:
          - in person

  communication_field_options: &communication_field_options
    select_result:
      edit_as:
        alt_options:
          "Completed": completed
          "Follow up": follow up
    select_next_step:
      edit_as:
        alt_options:
          # "More Info Requested": more info requested
          # "No Follow Up": no follow up
          "Call Back": call back
          "Email Back": email back


    select_contact:
      edit_as:
        field_type: select_record_from_player_contacts

    select_activity:
      edit_as:
        alt_options:
          "General Communications": general communications
          "Incidental Finding": incidental finding
          "Schedule Follow Up": schedule follow up
          "Mark All Previous As Completed": completed

    select_direction:
      edit_as:
        alt_options:
          "In Person": in person
          "By Phone": by phone


  communication_caption_before: &communication_caption_before
    select_activity: Select an action
    activity_date: Date
    select_contact: Phone or email address
    select_direction: Was the follow-up / interview performed in person or by phone?
    select_result: Is a follow up required, or is this communication complete?

# Override default enabled_if

  enabled_if: &enabled_if

    # if performed a phone screening no consent to continue, disable after 14 days
    not_all_not_interested:
      any:
        dynamic_model__grit_ps_initial_screenings:
          select_is_good_time_to_speak: not interested
          select_may_i_begin: not interested
          select_still_interested: 'no'

      all_created_at:
        dynamic_model__grit_ps_initial_screenings:
          created_at:
            condition: <
            value: -14 days

    # if recorded a withdraw activity, disable after 14 days
    not_all_withdraw:
      any_withdrawal: *any_withdrawal
      all_created_at:
        dynamic_model__grit_withdrawals:
          created_at:
            condition: <
            value: -14 days


_default:
  fields: *communication_fields

  show_if:
    <<: *communication_show_if

  field_options:
    <<: *communication_field_options
    
  caption_before: 
    <<: *communication_caption_before

  view_options:
    hide_unless_creatable: true

  showable_if: *enabled_if
  creatable_if: *enabled_if
  editable_if: *enabled_if



#################################################
request_pi_followup:
  label: Request PI Follow Up
#################################################

  fields:
    - notes

  caption_before:
    notes: 
      edit_caption: |
        A follow up by the PI with the participant is required, please provide
        information to assist the PI in this follow up.
      show_caption: |
        A follow up by the PI with the participant is required. 

        If you have have questions for the Phone Screen interviewer,
        please use the Discussions tab to communicate securely.

    submit: |
      When saved, a notification will be sent to the PI regarding this request


    reference_activity_log__grit_assignment_followup: |
      Add a record of the follow up communication.


  creatable_if: 
    <<: *enabled_if

  view_options:
    hide_unless_creatable: false
    
  references:
    activity_log__grit_assignment_followup:
      label: follow up communication
      from: this
      add: many
      add_with:
        extra_log_type: participant_followup
      filter_by:
        extra_log_type: participant_followup
        
      creatable_if: 
        <<: *enabled_if

  save_trigger:
    on_create:
    
      create_reference:
        ###### Grant PI access to participant ######
        - dynamic_model__grit_access_pis:
            in: master
            if:
              not_all:
                dynamic_model__grit_access_pis:
                  id:
                    condition: IS NOT NULL
                
      
    
      notify:
        ##### Notify the PI that the subject has questions #####
        - <<: *notify_pi
          subject: "GRIT Study: Participant Follow Up Required"
          extra_substitutions:
            reason: ''
            extra_text: |
              A response from the PI is required.
              
              Follow the link below to view the screening responses.
              
              If you have questions for the Phone Screen interviewer,
              please use the Discussions tab to communicate securely.


            panel_tab: activity-log--grit-assignment-med-navs      

        - <<: *notify_pi_sms
          subject: "Participant Follow Up Required"

    

#################################################
request_pi_ps_review:
  label: Request PI Phone Screen Review
#################################################


  fields:
    - notes
    - placeholder_next
    
  caption_before:
    notes: 
      edit_caption: |
        The Phone Screen requires a review by the PI before finalizing the 
        participant's eligibility status. Provide information to guide the PI's
        eligibility review
      show_caption: |
        The GRIT Study participant has completed the HMS phone screen, 
        and is possibly eligible. A review is required by the PI to confirm
        eligibility or ineligibility.

        If you have have questions for the HMS Phone Screen interviewer,
        please use the secure Discussions tab to communicate.

    submit: |
      When saved, a notification will be sent to the PI regarding this request

    placeholder_next: |
      When a decision has been made, record *eligibility decision*.


          
  creatable_if: 
    <<: *enabled_if

  view_options:
    hide_unless_creatable: false
    
  references:
    - activity_log__grit_assignment_followup:
        label: follow up communication
        from: this
        add: many
        add_with:
          extra_log_type: participant_followup
        filter_by:
          extra_log_type: participant_followup

        creatable_if: 
          <<: *enabled_if
          
    - activity_log__grit_assignment_followup:
        label: eligibility decision
        from: this
        add: one_to_this
        add_with:
          extra_log_type: pi_ps_review
        filter_by:
          extra_log_type: pi_ps_review

        creatable_if: 
          <<: *enabled_if



  save_trigger:
    on_create:
      create_reference:
        ###### Grant PI access to participant ######
        - dynamic_model__grit_access_pis:
            in: master
            if:
              not_all:
                dynamic_model__grit_access_pis:
                  id:
                    condition: IS NOT NULL
                
    
      notify:
    
        - <<: *notify_pi
          subject: "GRIT Study: PI review of HMS Phone Screen required"
          extra_substitutions:
            reason: ''
            extra_text: |
              The GRIT Study participant has completed the HMS phone screen, 
              and is possibly eligible. A review is required by the PI to confirm
              eligibility or ineligibility.
              
              Follow the link below to view the request and the 
              partipant Phone Screen details.
              
              If you have questions for the HMS Phone Screen interviewer,
              please use the secure Discussions tab to communicate.
              
              
            panel_tab: activity-log--grit-assignment-med-navs      

          
        - <<: *notify_pi_sms
          subject: "Review HMS Phone Screen eligibility"

    


#################################################
pi_ps_review:
  label: Eligibility Decision
#################################################

  fields:
    - select_result
    - notes

  field_options:
    select_result:
      edit_as:
        alt_options:
          Eligible: hms_ps_eligible
          Not Eligible: ineligible


  caption_before:
    select_result: |
      Select the eligibility decision.      
      
    submit: |
      When the form is saved the Phone Screen interviewer will be notified.
      
    notes: |
      Enter any notes related to your review. 

  valid_if: 
    on_create:
      not_any:
        this:
          select_result: 
            

  creatable_if:
    never: true
  showable_if:
    never: true
    
  view_options:
    hide_unless_creatable: true
    data_attribute: '(expand to view eligibility)'

  save_trigger:
    on_create:
      #create_reference:
      #  - activity_log__grit_assignment:
      #      in: master
      #      with:
      #        extra_log_type: hms_ps_eligible
      #      if: 
      #        <<: *enabled_if
      #        any_status:
      #          this:
      #            select_result: hms_ps_eligible

      #  - activity_log__grit_assignment:
      #      in: master
      #      with:
      #        extra_log_type: ineligible
      #      if: 
      #        <<: *enabled_if
      #        any_status:
      #          this:
      #            select_result: ineligible                  
      
      notify:
        # Notify phone screen interviewer the PI review is complete
        - type: email
          layout_template: grit notification layout
          content_template: grit notification message
          extra_substitutions:
            reason: ''
            extra_text: |
              The PI has completed the requested review of the the participant
              based on the HMS Phone Screen.
              
              Please review the response then follow up with the participant
              as needed.
              
            panel_tab: activity-log--grit-assignment-med-navs

          subject: "GRIT App: PI Completed Requested Review"
          role: phone screener
            



#################################################
participant_communication:
  label: Participant Communication
#################################################


  caption_before: 
    <<: *communication_caption_before
    select_direction: Was the communication received from the subject or sent to the subject?


  field_options:
    <<: *communication_field_options
    select_direction:
      edit_as:
        alt_options:
          "To Staff": to staff
          "To Subject": to subject


#################################################
participant_followup:
  label: Participant Follow Up
#################################################

  fields: *followup_fields


  caption_before: 
    <<: *communication_caption_before
    select_direction: Was the communication received from the subject or sent to the subject?


  field_options:
    <<: *communication_field_options
    select_direction:
      value: to subject
      edit_as:
        alt_options:
          "To Staff": to staff
          "To Subject": to subject

    activity_date: 
      value: today()
    

  creatable_if:
    never: true

  showable_if:
    never: true
    
  view_options:
    only_create_as_reference: true
    data_attribute: 
      - select_result
    hide_unless_creatable: true

  save_trigger:
    on_create:
      notify:
        # Notify phone screen interviewer the PI follow up is complete
        - type: email
          if:
            any:
              this:
                select_result: completed
                select_activity: completed
        
          layout_template: grit notification layout
          content_template: grit notification message
          extra_substitutions:
            reason: ''
            extra_text: |
              The PI has completed the requested phone screen 
              follow up with the participant.
              
              
            panel_tab: activity-log--grit-assignment-med-navs

          subject: "GRIT App: PI Completed Requested Follow Up"
          role: phone screener
                

#################################################
incidental_findings:
  label: Incidental Findings
#################################################

  fields:

  references:
    dynamic_model__grit_incidental_finding:
      from: this
      add: one_to_this
      prevent_disable: true
          
  creatable_if: 
    <<: *enabled_if
    not_any:
      activity_log__grit_assignment_followups:
        extra_log_type: incidental_findings

  view_options:
    hide_unless_creatable: false


    
#################################################
files:
  label: Files
#################################################

  fields:
    - notes
  
  caption_before:
    notes: Notes
    submit: Save to create a container for files
    
  save_trigger:
    on_create:
      <<: *create_filestore_container

  references:
    <<: *ref_filestore_container


#################################################
### UNUSED
pi_followup:
  label: PI Follow Up
#################################################

  fields:

  references:
    dynamic_model__grit_pi_followup:
      from: this
      add: many
      prevent_disable: true
          
  creatable_if:
    never: true
  showable_if:
    never: true
    
  view_options:
    hide_unless_creatable: true

valid_associated_activity_logs.name: GRIT Discussions
valid_associated_activity_logs.extra_log_types:
# @library grit enabled_if
# @library grit filestore_container
# @library grit notification_base

_definitions:

  ####
  # Boilerplace for notifying roles
  # Override the subject: and if: structures to refine operation
  ####

  # Default email - just add roles or users
  notify_email_default: &notify_email_default
    type: email
    layout_template: grit notification layout
    content_template: grit notification message
    subject: "GRIT Study App: Discussion Message - {{referring_record.id}}"
    extra_substitutions:
      reason: 'New Discussion Message'
      extra_text: |
        Discussion Subject: *{{referring_record.notes}}*
      panel_tab: activity-log--grit-assignment-discussions
      
      

  # Default SMS - just add roles or users
  notify_sms_default: &notify_sms_default
    type: sms
    layout_template: standard sms layout
    content_template: grit sms notification
    subject: "GRIT Study Discussion"


###############################################
# @library grit notify_roles
# @library grit discussions
###############################################



start_new_discussion:
  label: '{{notes}}'
  button_label: Start New Discussion
  <<: *setup_discussion
  
  field_options: 
    <<: *start_discussion_field_options
    tag_select_contact_role:
      edit_as:
        alt_options:
          HMS Admins: hms admins
          HMS Phone Screen Interviewers: hms phone screener
          MSM staff: msm staff          
          PI: pi
          


  showable_if:
    any:
      all_creator:
        this:
          user_id:
            user: id
          
      all:
        activity_log__grit_assignment_discussions:
          id:
            this: id
          tag_select_contact_role:
            condition: '&&'
            value: current_user_role_names
          
    
  references:
    - activity_log__grit_assignment_discussion:
        label: New Message
        from: this
        add: many
        prevent_disable: true
        add_with:
          extra_log_type: general_discussion
          prev_activity_type: general_discussion
        filter_by:
          extra_log_type: general_discussion



general_discussion:
  label: Message

  <<: *discussion_message_defaults

associated_dynamic_models.name: GRIT Audit-C

associated_dynamic_models.options:
# @library grit field_options
# @library grit ps_forms_eligibility

default:

  caption_before:
  
    placeholder_pi_review:
        show_caption: |
          ### **NOTE TO PI**
          
          The screener marked this form as **Possibly Eligible**
  
    placeholder_start: |
      The first few questions I’m going to ask you are about your alcohol intake.

    alcohol_frequency: How often do you have a drink containing alcohol?
    daily_alcohol: How many standard drinks containing alcohol do you have on a typical day?
    six_or_more_frequency: How often do you have six or more drinks on one occasion?
    total_score: Score

    possibly_eligible_yes_no: |
      *Based on the scores, the participant is ineligible. 
      If you believe the participant may be eligible, select **yes** and continue
      with the screening.*

    possibly_eligible_reason_notes: Reason
    
  field_options:
    <<: *ps_field_options

    total_score:
      edit_as:
        field_type: fixed_score
      calculate_with:
        sum: 
          - alcohol_frequency
          - daily_alcohol
          - six_or_more_frequency
          
      
  show_if:

    possibly_eligible_yes_no:
      never: true

    possibly_eligible_reason_notes:
      never: true
      
    possibly_eligible_yes_no:
      <<: *ineligible_rules_audit_c

    possibly_eligible_reason_notes:
      all:
        possibly_eligible_yes_no: 'yes'
      <<: *ineligible_rules_audit_c
        
    placeholder_pi_review:
      all:
        possibly_eligible_yes_no: 'yes'
      <<: *ineligible_rules_audit_c

associated_dynamic_models.name: GRIT Initial Screening
associated_dynamic_models.options:
# Unused fields: looked_at_website_yes_no

default:

  field_options:
    select_still_interested:
      value: 'yes'

  show_if:
  
  
    any_questions_blank_yes_no:
      select_is_good_time_to_speak: "yes"

    question_notes:
      any_questions_blank_yes_no: 'yes'

    select_still_interested:
      select_is_good_time_to_speak: 'yes'
      any_questions_blank_yes_no: 
        - "yes"       


    placeholder_not_appropriate_time:
      select_is_good_time_to_speak: not appropriate time
          
    follow_up_date:
      any:
        select_is_good_time_to_speak: 
          - not appropriate time
          - left voicemail
        select_still_interested: yes - call back

    follow_up_time:
      any:
        select_is_good_time_to_speak:
          - not appropriate time
          - left voicemail        
        select_still_interested: yes - call back
        

    more_questions_yes_no:
      all:
        any_questions_blank_yes_no: 
          - "yes"
          - "no"              
        select_still_interested:
          - "yes"
    
    
    more_questions_notes:
      all:
        any_questions_blank_yes_no: 
          - "yes"
          - "no"        
      
        select_still_interested:
          - "yes"
        more_questions_yes_no: 'yes'
        
    still_interested_2_yes_no:
      all:
        any_questions_blank_yes_no: 
          - "yes"
          - "no"        
      
        select_still_interested:
          - "yes"

    placeholder_not_interested:
      any:
        select_is_good_time_to_speak: not interested
        select_still_interested: no
        still_interested_2_yes_no: no
        
    placeholder_complete_intro:
      any:
        still_interested_2_yes_no:
          - "yes"


  dialog_before:
    select_is_good_time_to_speak: 
      name: grit ps intro
    any_questions_blank_yes_no: 
      name: grit ps intro overview
      label: show script

  caption_before:

    question_notes: |
      *Respond to questions and take notes below*


    select_still_interested: |
      Great.  If you are still interested in the study, 
      may I ask you some questions about your health to determine if you 
      are eligible to participate?  
      
    placeholder_not_appropriate_time: |
      
      Is there a better time I can call you to discuss the study and also determine if you are interested and eligible? 



    follow_up_date: |    
      Enter a follow up date and time if the subject wishes for a call back before continuing with the screening, or you left a voicemail. 
      
    follow_up_time: Follow up time
    
    more_questions_yes_no: |
      Great, let me tell you about the duration of the study and compensation.  
      If you complete the final screening assessments at Morehouse and you 
      are not eligible for the study, you will be compensated $25 for your 
      time on that day.  If you are eligible for the study and choose to 
      participate, you may be compensated anywhere from $525-$825 for 
      completed participation in the study, depending on the group to 
      which you are assigned and how many study visits you complete.  
      The length of time you spend in the study could range from 6-18 weeks, 
      depending on which group you are assigned to, and on your schedule.

      Do you have any more questions at this time?

    still_interested_2_yes_no: |
      Great.  
      
      If you are still interested in the study, may I ask you some 
      questions about your health to determine if you are eligible to participate?  

    placeholder_not_interested: |
      Okay, may I ask why you are not interested? 
      
      *(Record reasoning)*
      
      Thank you for letting me know, and for your time and participating 
      in our first health and wellness survey. Would you like me to see 
      if you are eligible for any other studies with us at this time?
      
      *As relevant provide information about other FPHS studies, 
      send links to other studies*


    placeholder_complete_intro: |
      Thank you. I’m going to ask you some questions to determine 
      if you are eligible for the study.  Please feel free to ask for 
      clarification at any time, or let me know if there is anything 
      you’d like me to repeat. 
      
    notes: |
      Notes, questions or other information for follow up

associated_dynamic_models.name: GRIT Phone Screen Eligible
associated_dynamic_models.field_list: questions_yes_no notes interested_yes_no not_interested_notes consent_to_pass_info_to_msm_yes_no consent_to_pass_info_to_msm_2_yes_no placeholder_consent_to_pass_info_2_no contact_info_notes placeholder_continue more_questions_yes_no placeholder_more_questions_yes placeholder_more_questions_no more_questions_notes select_still_interested  placeholder_select_still_interested_no placeholder_select_still_interested_yes placeholder_end
associated_dynamic_models.options:
default:

  field_options:
    select_still_interested:
      edit_as:
        alt_options:
          No Longer Interested: "no longer interested"
          Yes - Still Interested: "yes - still interested"

  caption_before: 
    all_fields: |
      Thank you for your time and for answering our questions.  
      Based on your responses so far you are eligible to participate in this study. 

      A reminder that two final screening assessments will take place 
      in person at Morehouse School of Medicine, and it’s 
      possible at that time you may not be eligible for the study.  
      If that is the case, you will still be compensated $25 for 
      the time you spend traveling to and participating in that session.

      A few other reminders - this study will take place in Atlanta at
      the Morehouse School of Medicine, and the purpose of this study 
      is to test a resilience skills training developed to improve those
      parts of your life affected by chronic pain such as quality of
      life, personal relationships, and personal growth or development. 

    questions_yes_no: |
      Do you have any questions at this time?
    
    interested_yes_no: |
      Are you still interested in participating?

    notes: |
      *Record questions*


    not_interested_notes: |
      May I ask you why you are not interested? 
      *(will record reason, for example, too busy)*. 
      
      Thank you for your time.
      
    consent_to_pass_info_to_msm_yes_no: |
      Wonderful. In order for you to participate I will need to give your 
      contact information to our collaborating researchers at Morehouse School
      of Medicine, and they will be conducting a two additional in-person 
      assessments to determine your eligibility.  This means that it’s 
      still possible you may be ineligible for the study, however based 
      on your responses so far, you’re a great candidate.

      Is it okay with you if I give them your contact information?


    consent_to_pass_info_to_msm_2_yes_no: |
      Okay - just to confirm, your information will be kept completely 
      secure and private, in a locked environment only accessible by 
      approved researchers. Access to your information at Morehouse will 
      be removed once the study has finished.  Does that alleviate any 
      concerns you may have?  
      
      If you’d still prefer not to participate I understand.

    
    placeholder_consent_to_pass_info_2_no: |
      Okay, I understand.  Well thank you so much for your time today and for 
      your support of our research, and we will certainly be in touch with 
      future participation opportunities.
      
      
    contact_info_notes: |
      Great.  Can I please confirm the contact information I have for you?
      
      *Scroll to Participant Details to check and add any contact information*

    placeholder_continue: |    
      Thank you.  We will only be sharing contact information for former 
      players with the team at Morehouse once we have 20 former players who are 
      eligible and interested in participating, and this may take some 
      time as we continue our recruitment efforts.  Once we reach that
      goal, we will send you an email stating that we have shared your 
      contact information with them, and you will hear from them 
      directly shortly thereafter.  They may contact you by email, by 
      telephone, or both.  This may take many weeks, or it may 
      be as soon as next week, so we appreciate your patience and do keep 
      an eye out for the next email from us.  At any time please 
      feel free to check in with us by phone or email, even if it’s 
      just to check in on the status of our recruitment efforts.

      If you are enrolled in the study at Morehouse, though they will be
      conducting the research with you at that location, we will be kept
      updated on your status in the study, and are always here to
      provide support and answer any questions at any time.

      And if you have any friends who are former players and live in the
      Atlanta area, please feel free to tell them about the study!
      They can contact us at atlanta@footballplayershealth.harvard.edu,
      or by the phone number listed on our website.    

    more_questions_yes_no: Do you have any questions about this?
    
    placeholder_more_questions_yes: |    
      *If Yes, about privacy:* 
      
      Just to confirm, your data and contact information lives in a highly 
      secure and private environment, accessible only to approved researchers 
      on the study team. The data we store is protected by a Certificate 
      of Confidentiality issued by the National Institute of Health. 
      This means that your identifiable information is protected from 
      forced disclosure (i.e. subpoenas) by all possible means.
      
      *other question - respond and record questions*
      
    
    placeholder_more_questions_no: |
      Great!  Then we will be in touch as soon as possible by email to confirm
      that we have provided the Morehouse researchers with your contact information.
    
    select_still_interested: |
      Does this alleviate any concerns you have? Do you have other questions? 
      If you would still prefer not to participate I understand.

    placeholder_select_still_interested_no: |
      Okay, I understand.  Well thank you so much for your time today and for 
      your support of our research, and we will certainly be in touch with 
      future participation opportunities.

    placeholder_select_still_interested_yes: |
      Great!  Then we will be in touch as soon as possible by email to 
      confirm that we have provided the Morehouse researchers with your 
      contact information.
    
    placeholder_end: |
      If you have any questions or want to contact us at any time, 
      you can reach me at 617-432-5000 or 
      atlanta@footballplayershealth.harvard.edu.
      
      **END SCREENING**
      
  show_if:
    
    notes:
      questions_yes_no: 'yes'
      
    interested_yes_no:
      questions_yes_no: 
        - 'yes'
        - 'no'
          
    not_interested_notes:
      interested_yes_no: 'no'
      
    consent_to_pass_info_to_msm_yes_no:
      interested_yes_no: 'yes'
      
    consent_to_pass_info_to_msm_2_yes_no:
      consent_to_pass_info_to_msm_yes_no: 'no'
      
    placeholder_consent_to_pass_info_2_no:
      consent_to_pass_info_to_msm_2_yes_no: 'no'
      
    contact_info_notes: &ok_to_continue
      any_ok_to_continue:
        consent_to_pass_info_to_msm_yes_no: 'yes'
        consent_to_pass_info_to_msm_2_yes_no: 'yes'
        
    placeholder_continue:
      <<: *ok_to_continue
      
    more_questions_yes_no:
      <<: *ok_to_continue
    
    placeholder_more_questions_yes:
      <<: *ok_to_continue
      any:
        more_questions_yes_no: 'yes'
        
    placeholder_more_questions_no:
      <<: *ok_to_continue
      any:
        more_questions_yes_no: 'no'
    
    more_questions_notes:
      <<: *ok_to_continue
      any:
        more_questions_yes_no: 'yes'
    
    select_still_interested:
      <<: *ok_to_continue
      any:
        more_questions_yes_no: 'yes'
    
    placeholder_select_still_interested_no:

associated_dynamic_models.name: Ability to Participate
associated_dynamic_models.field_list: commit_to_attend_yes_no small_group_yes_no possibly_eligible_yes_no possibly_eligible_reason_notes placeholder_commit_to_attend_no placeholder_small_group_no any_questions_yes_no notes placeholder_questions_yes placeholder_questions_no
associated_dynamic_models.options:
# @library grit ps_forms_eligibility

default:

  field_options:
    possibly_eligible_yes_no:
      value: 'no'

  caption_before:
  
    all_fields: |
      Thank you for answering those questions.  I’m now going to ask 
      you some final questions about your current overall health and 
      ability to participate in the study.    
  
    commit_to_attend_yes_no: |
      This study involves training sessions for four weeks 
      at the Morehouse School of Medicine.  Each training 
      session will be 90 minutes, and there will be two per week.  
      This means you’ll attend 8 training sessions in total.
      The sessions will take place between 4-6pm on two days 
      out of Mondays through Thursdays.  The exact days and times of
      the training will be set in advance for each group, and 
      the scheduling will not be able to accommodate individual schedules. 
      
      Can you commit to meeting these attendance requirements? 
    
    placeholder_commit_to_attend_no: |
      Ok - Unfortunately, this study requires that participants 
      are able to commit to the scheduling of the training program, 
      and I understand at this time you are unable to accommodate 
      this in your schedule.  If this changes at any point in 
      the near future, you are welcome to reach out to us again 
      once you would be available to participate.

    
    
    small_group_yes_no: |
      Are you able to participate in small group discussions? Some
      examples of things that might prevent you from being able to 
      do this are a disabling illnesses, dementia, a recent stroke, 
      or difficulty with day to day activities.
    
    placeholder_small_group_no: |
       Ok - Unfortunately, this study requires that participants are 
       able to participate in small group discussions as a part of 
       each training session, and I understand at this time you are 
       unable to do this.  If this changes at any point in the near 
       future, you are welcome to reach out to us again once you would 
       be available to participate.


    possibly_eligible_yes_no: |
      *Based on the scores, the participant is ineligible. 
      If you believe the participant may be eligible, select **yes** and continue
      with the screening.*

    possibly_eligible_reason_notes: Reason
    

    any_questions_yes_no: |
      Do you have any questions for me at this time?

    
    
    placeholder_questions_yes: |
      **Address questions and record responses**
      
      Thank you for your interest and your time!  
      
      **END SCREENING.**
    
    placeholder_questions_no: |
      Okay - thank you again for your interest and your time!  
      
      **END SCREENING.**
    
    notes: Record question and notes


  show_if:
      
    small_group_yes_no:
      commit_to_attend_yes_no: 'yes'
    
    placeholder_questions_no:
      all:
        any_questions_yes_no: 'no'
      <<: *ineligible_rules_participation
      
    possibly_eligible_yes_no: 
      never: true
#      <<: *ineligible_rules_participation

    possibly_eligible_reason_notes:
      all:
        possibly_eligible_yes_no: 'yes'
      <<: *ineligible_rules_participation
      
    placeholder_commit_to_attend_no:
      commit_to_attend_yes_no: 'no'
      possibly_eligible_yes_no: 'no'
    
    placeholder_small_group_no:
      small_group_yes_no: 'no'
      possibly_eligible_yes_no: 'no'

    any_questions_yes_no:
      <<: *ineligible_rules_participation
      all:
        possibly_eligible_yes_no: 'no'
      
    placeholder_questions_yes:
      all:
        possibly_eligible_yes_no: 'no'
        any_questions_yes_no: 'yes'
      <<: *ineligible_rules_participation

associated_dynamic_models.name: HMS Eligibility Follow Up
associated_dynamic_models.field_list: outcome placeholder_eligible_intro placeholder_ineligible_intro any_questions_yes_no notes interested_yes_no not_interested_notes placeholder_any_questions_no contact_pi_yes_no additional_questions_yes_no placeholder_additional_questions_no placeholder_additional_questions_yes placeholder_ineligible_pass_info_to_msm placeholder_eligible_pass_info_to_msm consent_to_pass_info_to_msm_yes_no placeholder_ineligible_pass_info_to_msm2 placeholder_eligible_pass_info_to_msm2 consent_to_pass_info_to_msm_2_yes_no placeholder_consent_to_pass_info_2_no placeholder_ineligible_contact_info placeholder_eligible_contact_info contact_info_notes placeholder_continue more_questions_yes_no placeholder_more_questions_yes placeholder_more_questions_no more_questions_notes select_still_interested  placeholder_select_still_interested_no placeholder_select_still_interested_yes placeholder_finish
associated_dynamic_models.options:
default:

  field_options:
    outcome:
      edit_as:
        field_type: select_outcome
        alt_options:
          - eligible
          - ineligible
    select_still_interested:
      edit_as:
        alt_options:
          No Longer Interested: "no longer interested"
          Yes - Still Interested: "yes - still interested"

  labels:
    consent_to_pass_info_to_msm_yes_no: Consented?
    consent_to_pass_info_to_msm_2_yes_no: Consented?
  

  caption_before:
  
    outcome: Select the HMS Phone Screen eligibility based on the PI review
    

    notes: Additional Notes


    
    
    ##### Eligible #####
    
    placeholder_eligible_intro: |
      Thank you for your time and for answering our questions.
      
      Based on your responses so far you are eligible to participate in this study.
      
      Do you have any questions?
      
    interested_yes_no: |
      Are you interested in participating?



    not_interested_notes: |
      May I ask you why you are not interested? 
      *(will record reason, for example, too busy)*. 
      
      Thank you for your time.



    placeholder_eligible_pass_info_to_msm: |
      Wonderful. In order for you to participate I will need to give your 
      contact information to our collaborating researchers at Morehouse School
      of Medicine, and they will be conducting a two additional in-person 
      assessments to determine your eligibility.  This means that it’s 
      still possible you may be ineligible for the study, however based 
      on your responses so far, you’re a great candidate.

      Is it okay with you if I give them your contact information?

    placeholder_eligible_pass_info_to_msm2: |
      Okay - just to confirm, your information will be kept completely 
      secure and private, in a locked environment only accessible by 
      approved researchers. Access to your information at Morehouse will 
      be removed once the study has finished.  Does that alleviate any 
      concerns you may have?  
      
      If you’d still prefer not to participate I understand.


    placeholder_consent_to_pass_info_2_no: |
      Okay, I understand.  Well thank you so much for your time today and for your 
      support of our research, and we will certainly be in touch with 
      future participation opportunities.
      
      If you have any questions or want to contact me at any time, you 
      can reach me at 617-432-5000 or atlanta@footballplayershealth.harvard.edu.



    placeholder_eligible_contact_info: |
      Great.  Can I please confirm the contact information I have for you?
      
      *Scroll to Participant Details to check and add any contact information*

    placeholder_continue: |    
      Thank you.  We will only be sharing contact information for former 
      players with the team at Morehouse once we have 20 former players who are 
      eligible and interested in participating, and this may take some 
      time as we continue our recruitment efforts.  Once we reach that
      goal, we will send you an email stating that we have shared your 
      contact information with them, and you will hear from them 
      directly shortly thereafter.  They may contact you by email, by 
      telephone, or both.  This may take many weeks, or it may 
      be as soon as next week, so we appreciate your patience and do keep 
      an eye out for the next email from us.  At any time please 
      feel free to check in with us by phone or email, even if it’s 
      just to check in on the status of our recruitment efforts.

      If you are enrolled in the study at Morehouse, though they will be
      conducting the research with you at that location, we will be kept
      updated on your status in the study, and are always here to
      provide support and answer any questions at any time.

      And if you have any friends who are former players and live in the
      Atlanta area, please feel free to tell them about the study!
      They can contact us at atlanta@footballplayershealth.harvard.edu,
      or by the phone number listed on our website.    


    more_questions_yes_no: Do you have any questions about this?
    
    placeholder_more_questions_yes: |    
      *If Yes, about privacy:* 
      
      Just to confirm, your data and contact information lives in a highly 
      secure and private environment, accessible only to approved researchers 
      on the study team. The data we store is protected by a Certificate 
      of Confidentiality issued by the National Institute of Health. 
      This means that your identifiable information is protected from 
      forced disclosure (i.e. subpoenas) by all possible means.
      
      *other question - respond and record questions*
      
    
    placeholder_more_questions_no: |
      Great!  Then we will be in touch as soon as possible by email to confirm
      that we have provided the Morehouse researchers with your contact information.
    
    select_still_interested: |
      Does this alleviate any concerns you have? Do you have other questions? 
      If you would still prefer not to participate I understand.

    placeholder_select_still_interested_no: |
      Okay, I understand.  Well thank you so much for your time today and for 
      your support of our research, and we will certainly be in touch with 
      future participation opportunities.

    placeholder_select_still_interested_yes: |
      Great!  Then we will be in touch as soon as possible by email to 
      confirm that we have provided the Morehouse researchers with your 
      contact information.
    

      

    ##### Ineligible #####
    
    placeholder_ineligible_intro: |
      Thank you for answering our questions. 
      Unfortunately, at this time you do not qualify for this particular study. 
      We really appreciate your interest in research and 
      helping to improve the health of former players nationwide. 
      We will be sure to contact you about future studies that you may be eligible for.

      Do you have any questions for me at this time?
    
    placeholder_any_questions_no: |
      Okay - thank you again for your interest and your time! 
    
    contact_pi_yes_no: |
      *Address questions*
      
      *If they ask why they are not eligible:* 
      
      Actually the way that our system works, 
      I’m not able to determine exactly which question caused you to be 
      ineligible for the study right now, but if you have concerns 
      or would like to discuss it further with our study PI, 
      I would be happy to put you in touch with him if you would like. 
      
      Is that something you would like to do?



    # Had questions but no contact with PI requested
    additional_questions_yes_no: |
      Okay, I understand.  
      
      Do you have any other questions for me at the moment?
      
    placeholder_additional_questions_no: |
      Okay - thank you again for your interest and your time! 

    placeholder_additional_questions_yes: |
      *Address questions*

      

    placeholder_ineligible_pass_info_to_msm: |
      Absolutely. In order for him to contact you I will need to give 
      your contact information to our collaborating researchers at 
      Morehouse School of Medicine.
      
      Is that okay with you?
      
    placeholder_ineligible_pass_info_to_msm2: |
      Okay - just to confirm, your information will be kept completely 
      secure and private, in a locked environment only accessible by 
      approved researchers. Access to your information at Morehouse will 
      be removed once the study has finished.  Does that alleviate any 
      concerns you may have?  
      
      If you’d still prefer I not provide them with your contact 
      information I understand.

    placeholder_ineligible_contact_info: |
      Great. I will give your contact information to the research team at Morehouse, 
      and our study PI, Dr. Leroy Reese, will reach out to you as soon as possible.
      
      Can I please confirm the contact information I have for you?
      
      *Scroll to Participant Details to check and add any contact information*
      
      
    placeholder_finish: |
      If you have any questions or want to contact us at any time, 
      you can reach me at 617-432-5000 or 
      atlanta@footballplayershealth.harvard.edu.
      
      **END SCREENING**
      

  show_if:

    placeholder_ineligible_intro:
      outcome: ineligible

    placeholder_eligible_intro:
      outcome: eligible

    any_questions_yes_no:
      outcome: 
        - eligible
        - ineligible
    
    notes:
      any_questions_yes_no: 'yes'

    interested_yes_no:
      outcome: eligible
  
    not_interested_notes:
      outcome: eligible
      interested_yes_no: 'no'

      
    placeholder_any_questions_no:
      outcome: ineligible
      any_questions_yes_no: 'no'
      
    contact_pi_yes_no:
      outcome: ineligible
      any_questions_yes_no: 'yes'

    additional_questions_yes_no:
      outcome: ineligible
      any_questions_yes_no: 'yes'
      contact_pi_yes_no: 'no'
      
    placeholder_additional_questions_no:
      never: true
#      outcome: ineligible
#      any_questions_yes_no: 'yes'
#      contact_pi_yes_no: 'no'
#      additional_questions_yes_no: 'no'
      
    placeholder_additional_questions_yes:
      outcome: ineligible
      any_questions_yes_no: 'yes'
      contact_pi_yes_no: 'no'
      additional_questions_yes_no: 'yes'


    placeholder_ineligible_pass_info_to_msm:
      outcome: ineligible
      contact_pi_yes_no: 'yes'

    placeholder_eligible_pass_info_to_msm:
      outcome: eligible      
      interested_yes_no: 'yes'

    consent_to_pass_info_to_msm_yes_no:
      any:
        interested_yes_no: 'yes'
        contact_pi_yes_no: 'yes'


    placeholder_ineligible_pass_info_to_msm2:
      all:
        outcome: ineligible
        contact_pi_yes_no: 'yes'
      any:
        consent_to_pass_info_to_msm_yes_no: 'no'

    placeholder_eligible_pass_info_to_msm2:
      all:
        outcome: eligible
        consent_to_pass_info_to_msm_yes_no: 'no'

    consent_to_pass_info_to_msm_2_yes_no:
      any:
        interested_yes_no: 'yes'
        contact_pi_yes_no: 'yes'
      all:
        consent_to_pass_info_to_msm_yes_no: 'no'


    placeholder_consent_to_pass_info_2_no:
      consent_to_pass_info_to_msm_yes_no: 'no'
      consent_to_pass_info_to_msm_2_yes_no: 'no'
      
    placeholder_eligible_contact_info:
      all:
        outcome: eligible
      any:
        consent_to_pass_info_to_msm_yes_no: 'yes'
        consent_to_pass_info_to_msm_2_yes_no: 'yes'

    placeholder_ineligible_contact_info:
      all:
        outcome: ineligible
      any:
        consent_to_pass_info_to_msm_yes_no: 'yes'
        consent_to_pass_info_to_msm_2_yes_no: 'yes'

      
    contact_info_notes: &ok_to_continue
      any_ok_to_continue:
        consent_to_pass_info_to_msm_yes_no: 'yes'
        consent_to_pass_info_to_msm_2_yes_no: 'yes'
        
    placeholder_continue:
      <<: *ok_to_continue
      
    more_questions_yes_no:
      <<: *ok_to_continue
    
    placeholder_more_questions_yes:
      <<: *ok_to_continue
      any:
        more_questions_yes_no: 'yes'
        
    placeholder_more_questions_no:
      <<: *ok_to_continue
      any:
        more_questions_yes_no: 'no'
    
    more_questions_notes:
      <<: *ok_to_continue
      any:
        more_questions_yes_no: 'yes'
    
    select_still_interested:
      <<: *ok_to_continue
      any:
        more_questions_yes_no: 'yes'
    
    placeholder_select_still_interested_no:
      <<: *ok_to_continue
      all:
        more_questions_yes_no: 'yes'
        select_still_interested: 'no longer interested'

    placeholder_select_still_interested_yes:
      <<: *ok_to_continue
      all:
        more_questions_yes_no: 'yes'
        select_still_interested: 'yes - still interested'
    
        
    placeholder_finish:
      any:
        any_questions_yes_no:
          - 'yes'
          - 'no'
        interested_yes_no:

          - 'no'
