associated_dynamic_models.name: GRIT Screener Responses
associated_dynamic_models.field_list: comm_clearly_in_english_yes_no, give_informed_consent_yes_no_dont_know, give_informed_consent_notes, outcome, placeholder_eligible, placeholder_ineligible, placeholder_possibly_eligible, notes
associated_dynamic_models.options:
default:

  field_options:
    outcome:
      edit_as:
        field_type: select_outcome
        alt_options:
          eligible: eligible
          ineligible: ineligible
          possibly eligible: possibly_eligible         
          
      value: 
        all:
          activity_log__grit_assignment_phone_screens:
            extra_log_type: 
              - eligible
              - ineligible
              - possibly_eligible
              - return_value
          

  caption_before:
    all_fields: |
      The screening is complete. The following questions are for 
      the screening interviewer to 
      indicate whether they believe the participant could communicate clearly and
      give informed consent.
      
    
    comm_clearly_in_english_yes_no: Is the subject able to communicate clearly in English?
    give_informed_consent_yes_no_dont_know: Does the subject appear to be able to give informed consent?
    give_informed_consent_notes: Notes
    
    
    outcome: |
      Set the eligibility status for the participant.
      

    placeholder_possibly_eligible: |
      The participant is *possibly eligible*. The PI will be notified that a review is
      required. Once confirmation of status has been received from the PI, 
      click the **Eligibility Follow Up** button to follow the script for communicating
      this result to the participant.
    
    placeholder_ineligible: |
      The participant was ineligible 
      
      If they requested a
      follow up from the PI a notification will be sent to the PI automatically. The
      request for follow up can be tracked in the **follow ups** panel.
      
      When ready, continue to the **Finalize** activity.
    
    placeholder_eligible: |
      The participant was eligible. When ready, continue to the **Finalize** activity.

    notes: |
      Any notes about the screener can be recorded below.

    submit: |
      When this form is saved communications with the MSM team can continue if necessary.

associated_reports.name: Needs Follow Up Communication
associated_reports.description: Participants with an appointment set that are ready for specific follow up activities.
associated_reports.sql:
select al0.master_id, max(al0.updated_at) "updated_at"
from 
  activity_log_grit_assignments al0
  
-- Ensure this is a record appearing at the top level, not referenced from 
-- a top level activity
left join model_references mr1
  on mr1.to_record_master_id = al0.master_id
  and mr1.to_record_type = 'ActivityLog::GRITAssignment'
  and mr1.to_record_id = al0.id
left join activity_log_grit_assignments al02
  on mr1.from_record_master_id = al02.master_id
  and mr1.from_record_type = 'ActivityLog::GRITAssignment'
  and mr1.from_record_id = al02.id
  and al02.extra_log_type = 'general'  
  
where 
  al0.extra_log_type = 'general'
  and ( 
    al02.id is null 
    and
    (
      coalesce(al0.select_result, 'none') <> 'completed' 
      and coalesce(al0.select_activity, 'none') <> 'completed' 
    )
    and
      -- Check this does not have a referenced record 
      -- marked as completed
      al0.id not in 
      (
        select al.id
        from activity_log_grit_assignments al
        inner join model_references mr
          on mr.from_record_master_id = al.master_id
          and mr.from_record_type = 'ActivityLog::GRITAssignment'
          and mr.from_record_id = al.id
        inner join activity_log_grit_assignments al2
          on mr.to_record_master_id = al2.master_id
          and mr.to_record_type = 'ActivityLog::GRITAssignment'
          and mr.to_record_id = al2.id
          and al2.extra_log_type = 'general'
        where 
          al.master_id = al0.master_id
          and al.extra_log_type = 'general'
          and  (
            coalesce(al.select_result, 'none') = 'completed' 
            or coalesce(al2.select_result, 'none') = 'completed' 
            or coalesce(al.select_activity, 'none') = 'completed' 
            or coalesce(al2.select_activity, 'none') = 'completed' 
          )
      )
    ) 
    
  and al0.master_id not in (
    select sa2.master_id 
    from activity_log_grit_assignments sa2
    where extra_log_type in ('exit_ps', 'exit_not_consented', 'ineligible', 'exit_ps_msm', 'completed', 'exit_opt_out', 'exit_l2fu')
    and created_at < (current_date - 14)
  )
  and al0.master_id not in (
    select dsw.master_id 
    from grit_withdrawals dsw
    where 
    select_subject_withdrew_reason = 'withdrew'
    and created_at < (current_date - 14)
  )    
group by al0.master_id
order by 
  "updated_at" desc;

associated_reports.name: Search GRIT Study Subject
associated_reports.description:
Search subjects by name, phone, email or ID.
Leave the search field empty to see all subjects.
associated_reports.sql:
select distinct m.id master_id, 
pi.first_name, pi.middle_name, pi.last_name, pi.nick_name,
a.street, a.street2, a.city, a.state, a.zip, 
pc.data, pc.rec_type
from masters m
inner join player_infos pi
on pi.master_id = m.id 
inner join grit_assignments b
on m.id = b.master_id
left join addresses a
on m.id = a.master_id
left join player_contacts pc
on pc.master_id = m.id
where 
(:name is null 
or pi.first_name ~* :name
or pi.last_name ~* :name
or pi.middle_name ~* :name
or pi.nick_name ~* :name
or( 
    pi.first_name ~* coalesce(split_part(:name, ' ', 1),'none')
    AND pi.last_name ~* coalesce(split_part(:name, ' ', 2),'none')
  )
) OR
(
regexp_replace(pc.data, '\W+', '', 'g') ~* regexp_replace(:name, '\W+', '', 'g')
) OR
(
b.grit_id::varchar = :name
)
associated_reports.search_attrs:
name: 
  text: 
    all: true
    multiple: single

associated_reports.name: Protocol Deviation PI Review
associated_reports.description: GRIT Study Protocol Deviation records requiring review by the PI.
associated_reports.sql:
SELECT 
dt.master_id

FROM (
 SELECT a2.*,
   rank()
 OVER (
  PARTITION BY a.id
  ORDER BY a.created_at DESC, a2.created_at DESC
 ) AS r
 FROM activity_log_grit_assignment_protocol_deviations a

 INNER JOIN model_references mr
 ON
   mr.to_record_type = 'DynamicModel::IpaProtocolDeviation'
   AND mr.from_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentProtocolDeviation'
   AND mr.from_record_id = a.id

 INNER JOIN grit_protocol_deviations p
 ON 
   mr.to_record_type = 'DynamicModel::IpaProtocolDeviation'
   AND mr.from_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentProtocolDeviation'
   AND mr.from_record_id = a.id
   AND mr.to_record_id = p.id

 INNER JOIN model_references mr2
 ON
   mr2.from_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentProtocolDeviation'
   AND mr2.to_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentProtocolDeviation'
   AND mr2.from_record_id = a.id

 INNER JOIN activity_log_grit_assignment_protocol_deviations a2
 ON
   mr2.from_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentProtocolDeviation'
   AND mr2.to_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentProtocolDeviation'
   AND mr2.from_record_id = a.id
   AND mr2.to_record_id = a2.id

 WHERE 
 a.extra_log_type = 'deviation_record' 
 AND a2.extra_log_type in ('pi_review', 'initial_review')
 AND p.select_severity = 'major'


) AS dt

inner join player_infos pi on dt.master_id = pi.master_id
WHERE
  r >= 1 AND dt.extra_log_type = 'initial_review'
AND
  r = 1 AND dt.extra_log_type <> 'pi_review'

ORDER BY
  dt.created_at DESC
;

SELECT 
dt.master_id

 SELECT a2.*,

 ) AS r
 FROM activity_log_grit_assignment_adverse_events a

 INNER JOIN grit_adverse_events p

 INNER JOIN model_references mr2
 ON

associated_reports.name: Adverse Events
associated_reports.description:
GRIT Study Adverse Events report for fast review of events requiring additional action or for summary reporting.

The activities are performed in this order: initial submission, initial review, PI review (if required), report to IRB (if PI review was required)

NOTE: the Last Activity Performed represents the last recorded activity for a specific adverse event. Therefore to find outstanding tasks, for example items requiring Report to IRB, it is necessary to search for the last activity that was performed, PI Review in this example.
associated_reports.sql:
SELECT 
dt.master_id,
ipa.grit_id,
coalesce(dt.created_at, dt.submitted_at) "last activity",
coalesce(dt.extra_log_type, 'initial submission') "Last Activity Performed",
--pi.first_name,
--pi.last_name,
select_severity, select_location, select_relatedness, select_expectedness, event_occurred_when, event_discovered_when,
dt.primary_extra_log_type,
dt.primary_activity
FROM (
 SELECT a.master_id , a.id "primary_activity", a.extra_log_type "primary_extra_log_type", a.created_at "submitted_at", a2.created_at, a2.extra_log_type, p.select_severity, p.select_location, p.select_relatedness, p.select_expectedness,
   p.event_occurred_when, p.event_discovered_when,
   rank()
 OVER (
  PARTITION BY a.id
  ORDER BY a.created_at DESC, a2.created_at DESC
 ) AS r
 FROM activity_log_grit_assignment_adverse_events a

 INNER JOIN model_references mr
 ON
   mr.to_record_type = 'DynamicModel::IpaAdverseEvent'
   AND mr.from_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentAdverseEvent'
   AND mr.from_record_id = a.id

 INNER JOIN grit_adverse_events p
 ON 
   mr.to_record_type = 'DynamicModel::IpaAdverseEvent'
   AND mr.from_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentAdverseEvent'
   AND mr.from_record_id = a.id
   AND mr.to_record_id = p.id

 LEFT JOIN model_references mr2
 ON
   mr2.from_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentAdverseEvent'
   AND mr2.to_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentAdverseEvent'
   AND mr2.from_record_id = a.id

 LEFT JOIN activity_log_grit_assignment_adverse_events a2
 ON
   mr2.from_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentAdverseEvent'
   AND mr2.to_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentAdverseEvent'
   AND mr2.from_record_id = a.id
   AND mr2.to_record_id = a2.id


 WHERE 
 a.extra_log_type = 'adverse_event_record' 


) AS dt

inner join player_infos pi on dt.master_id = pi.master_id
INNER JOIN grit_assignments grit ON dt.master_id = grit.master_id
WHERE r = 1 
AND (:event_occurred_from IS NULL OR event_occurred_when >= :event_occurred_from)
AND (:event_occurred_to IS NULL OR event_occurred_when <= :event_occurred_to)
AND (:severity IS NULL OR select_severity = :severity)
AND (:location IS NULL OR select_location = :location)
AND ((:relatedness) IS NULL OR select_relatedness IN (:relatedness))
AND ((:expectedness) IS NULL OR select_expectedness = (:expectedness))
AND ((:latest_activity) IS NULL OR coalesce(dt.extra_log_type, 'initial submission') IN (:latest_activity))

ORDER BY
  dt.created_at DESC
;
associated_reports.search_attrs:
severity: 
  general_selection: 
    item_type: dynamic_model__grit_adverse_events_select_severity
    multiple: single
    default: serious
location: 
  general_selection:

    multiple: single

relatedness: 
  general_selection: 
    item_type: dynamic_model__grit_adverse_events_select_relatedness

associated_reports.name: Subjects In Process & Exited
associated_reports.description: All subjects that have joined or exited the study: in process (phone screening scheduled), enrolled, completed, withdrawn, ineligible, other exit (not interested, etc). The search matches the latest status of a participant, so as they pass through the process they will only be matched by one status.
associated_reports.sql:
SELECT * from (
  SELECT distinct dt.master_id, grit.grit_id, msm_grit.msm_grit_id,
  CASE 
  WHEN extra_log_type = 'completed' THEN 'completed study'
  WHEN extra_log_type = 'completed_intervention' THEN 'completed bbti'
  WHEN extra_log_type = 'withdraw' THEN 'withdrawn'
  WHEN extra_log_type IN ('exit_not_consented', 'exit_ps', 'exit_ps_msm', 'exit_opt_out', 'exit_l2fu') THEN 'exited'
  WHEN extra_log_type = 'ineligible' THEN 'ineligible'
  WHEN extra_log_type = 'msm_ps_eligible' THEN 'eligible'
  WHEN extra_log_type = 'schedule_screening' THEN 'in process'
  WHEN extra_log_type = 'appointment' THEN 'enrolled'
  ELSE extra_log_type
  END "status", 
  dt.created_at 
  FROM 
  (
    SELECT
    al.master_id, al.created_at, al.extra_log_type,    
    rank()
     OVER (
      PARTITION BY al.master_id 
      ORDER BY al.created_at DESC
     ) AS r

    FROM activity_log_grit_assignments al
    WHERE   
    extra_log_type IN (
      'schedule_screening', 
      'msm_ps_eligible', 
      'ineligible', 
      'exit_not_consented', 
      'exit_ps', 
      'exit_ps_msm',
      'exit_opt_out',
      'exit_l2fu',
      'appointment',
      'completed',
      'completed_intervention',
      'withdraw'
    )
  ) dt
  INNER JOIN grit_assignments grit ON dt.master_id = grit.master_id
  LEFT OUTER JOIN msm_grit_id_numbers msm_grit ON dt.master_id = msm_grit.master_id
  WHERE r = 1 
) dt2
WHERE status IN(:select_status)
ORDER BY status, created_at desc
;
associated_reports.search_attrs:
select_status: 
  config_selector:
    label: Select / de-select statuses to report  
    all: true
    multiple: multiple
    default: 
      - eligible
#      - ineligible
#      - completed
#      - withdrawn
#      - exited
      - enrolled
      - in process
    selections: 
      eligible: eligible
      ineligible: ineligible
      completed study: completed study
      completed bbti: completed bbti
      withdrawn: withdrawn
      exited: exited
      enrolled: enrolled
      in process: in process

associated_reports.name: Protocol Deviations
associated_reports.description:
GRIT Study Protocol Deviations report for fast review of events requiring additional action or for summary reporting.

The activities are performed in this order: initial submission, initial review, PI review (if required), report to IRB (if PI review was required)

NOTE: the Last Activity Performed represents the last recorded activity for a specific protocol deviations. Therefore to find outstanding tasks, for example items requiring Report to IRB, it is necessary to search for the last activity that was performed, PI Review in this example.
associated_reports.sql:
SELECT 
dt.master_id,
ipa.grit_id,
coalesce(dt.created_at, dt.submitted_at) "last activity",
coalesce(dt.extra_log_type, 'initial submission') "Last Activity Performed",
-- pi.first_name,
-- pi.last_name,
select_severity, deviation_occurred_when, deviation_discovered_when,
dt.primary_extra_log_type,
dt.primary_activity
FROM (
 SELECT a.master_id , a.id "primary_activity", a.extra_log_type "primary_extra_log_type", a.created_at "submitted_at", a2.created_at, a2.extra_log_type, p.select_severity, 
   p.deviation_occurred_when, p.deviation_discovered_when,
   rank()
 OVER (
  PARTITION BY a.id
  ORDER BY a.created_at DESC, a2.created_at DESC
 ) AS r
 FROM activity_log_grit_assignment_protocol_deviations a

 INNER JOIN model_references mr
 ON
   mr.to_record_type = 'DynamicModel::IpaProtocolDeviation'
   AND mr.from_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentProtocolDeviation'
   AND mr.from_record_id = a.id

 INNER JOIN grit_protocol_deviations p
 ON 
   mr.to_record_type = 'DynamicModel::IpaProtocolDeviation'
   AND mr.from_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentProtocolDeviation'
   AND mr.from_record_id = a.id
   AND mr.to_record_id = p.id

 LEFT JOIN model_references mr2
 ON
   mr2.from_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentProtocolDeviation'
   AND mr2.to_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentProtocolDeviation'
   AND mr2.from_record_id = a.id

 LEFT JOIN activity_log_grit_assignment_protocol_deviations a2
 ON
   mr2.from_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentProtocolDeviation'
   AND mr2.to_record_type = 'ActivityLog::IpaAssignmentProtocolDeviation'
   AND mr2.from_record_id = a.id
   AND mr2.to_record_id = a2.id


 WHERE 
 a.extra_log_type = 'deviation_record' 


) AS dt

inner join player_infos pi on dt.master_id = pi.master_id
inner join grit_assignments grit on dt.master_id = grit.master_id
WHERE 
r = 1 
AND (:deviation_occurred_from IS NULL OR deviation_occurred_when >= :deviation_occurred_from)
AND (:deviation_occurred_to IS NULL OR deviation_occurred_when <= :deviation_occurred_to)
AND (:severity IS NULL OR select_severity = :severity)
AND ((:latest_activity) IS NULL OR coalesce(dt.extra_log_type, 'initial submission') IN (:latest_activity))

ORDER BY
  dt.created_at DESC
;

  general_selection: 
    item_type: dynamic_model__grit_protocol_deviations_select_severity
    multiple: single
    default: serious

deviation_occurred_from:

deviation_occurred_to:

latest_activity:

    default:
      - pi_review

associated_reports.name: GRIT Calendar
associated_reports.sql:
create temp table appointments
as select
visit_start_date,
ap.master_id,
grit.grit_id,
pi.first_name,
pi.last_name,
max(ap.id) appointment_id
from grit_appointments ap
inner join activity_log_grit_assignments al
on al.master_id = ap.master_id

inner join player_infos pi
on ap.master_id = pi.master_id

inner join grit_assignments grit
on grit.master_id = al.master_id


where
  visit_start_date IS NOT NULL
  AND (:from_date IS NULL or visit_start_date >= :from_date)
  AND (:to_date IS NULL or visit_start_date <= :to_date)
  AND (:grit_id IS NULL or grit.grit_id = :grit_id)
GROUP BY
ap.master_id, visit_start_date, pi.first_name, pi.last_name, grit.grit_id
;

create temp table scheduled_calls
as select
  dt.follow_up_when,
  dt.follow_up_time,
  dt.master_id,
  grit.grit_id,
--  p.first_name,
--  p.last_name,
  dt.extra_log_type,
  dt.select_who,
  dt.select_next_step
from
  (
    select a.master_id,
      a.extra_log_type,
      a.select_who,
      a.follow_up_when,
      a.follow_up_time,
      a.notes,
      a.select_next_step,
      rank()
    OVER (
      PARTITION BY a.master_id, a.extra_log_type
      ORDER BY a.created_at DESC
    ) AS r

    from activity_log_grit_assignments a
    where
      follow_up_when is not null
      AND (:from_date IS NULL OR follow_up_when >= :from_date)
      AND (:to_date IS NULL OR follow_up_when <= :to_date )
  ) dt
--inner join player_infos p
--  on dt.master_id = p.master_id

inner join grit_assignments grit
  on dt.master_id = grit.master_id

WHERE r = 1
AND (:grit_id IS NULL or grit.grit_id = :grit_id)
;


create temp table pi_calls
as select
  dt.follow_up_when,
  dt.follow_up_time,
  dt.master_id,
  grit.grit_id,
--  p.first_name,
--  p.last_name,
  dt.extra_log_type,
  dt.select_who,
  dt.select_next_step
from
  (
    select a.master_id,
      a.extra_log_type,
      'PI' select_who,
      a.follow_up_when,
      a.follow_up_time,
      a.notes,
      a.select_next_step,
      rank()
    OVER (
      PARTITION BY a.master_id, a.extra_log_type
      ORDER BY a.created_at DESC
    ) AS r

    from activity_log_grit_assignment_followups a
    where
      follow_up_when is not null
      AND (:from_date IS NULL OR follow_up_when >= :from_date)
      AND (:to_date IS NULL OR follow_up_when <= :to_date )
  ) dt
--inner join player_infos p
--  on dt.master_id = p.master_id

inner join grit_assignments grit
  on dt.master_id = grit.master_id

WHERE r = 1
AND (:grit_id IS NULL or grit.grit_id = :grit_id)
;

/*
create temp table all_dates
as
select follow_up_when from scheduled_calls
union
select visit_start_date from appointments
;
*/

SELECT
  true "allDay",
  visit_start_date::varchar || 'T' || '00:00:00' "start",
  null "end",
  'assessment start' "title",
  array['report-cal-start-event'] "classNames",
  '/masters/' || master_id "url"
FROM appointments

UNION
SELECT
  true ,
  '2019-06-20' ,
  null ,
  'assessment start' ,
  array['report-cal-start-event'] "classNames",
  null "url"

UNION

SELECT
  false,
  follow_up_when::varchar || 'T' || follow_up_time::varchar,
  NULL,
  case when select_next_step = 'email back' then '(email)'
  else '(call)' end
  || ' ' ||
  case when extra_log_type = 'schedule_screening' then 'scheduled HMS screening'
  when extra_log_type = 'schedule_screening_2' then 'scheduled MSM screening'
  when extra_log_type = 'screening_followup' then 'scheduled informed consent'
  else extra_log_type end
  ,
  array['report-cal-call-event', extra_log_type] "classNames",
  '/masters/' || master_id "url"
FROM scheduled_calls

UNION

SELECT
  false,
  follow_up_when::varchar || 'T' || follow_up_time::varchar,
  NULL,
  case when select_next_step = 'email back' then '(email)'
  else '(call)' end
  || ' ' ||
  case when extra_log_type = 'participant_followup' then 'PI follow up'
  when extra_log_type = 'participant_communication' then 'PI participant communication'
  else extra_log_type end
  ,
  array['report-cal-pi-call-event'] "classNames",
    '/masters/' || master_id || '#activity-log--grit-assignment-med-navs-' || master_id "url"
FROM pi_calls
;

associated_reports.sql:
select sa.master_id, sa.grit_id
from grit_assignments sa
where sa.master_id not in (
  select ps.master_id 
  from activity_log_grit_assignment_phone_screens ps
  where extra_log_type = 'finalize'
)
and sa.master_id not in (
  select sa2.master_id 
  from activity_log_grit_assignments sa2
  where 
  extra_log_type in ('exit_ps', 'exit_not_consented', 'ineligible', 'exit_ps_msm','exit_opt_out', 'exit_l2fu')
  and created_at < (current_date - 14)

)
and sa.master_id not in (
  select dsw.master_id 
  from grit_withdrawals dsw
  where 
  select_subject_withdrew_reason = 'withdrew'
  and created_at < (current_date - 14)

)
;

associated_reports.name: Ready for PI Follow Up
associated_reports.sql:
SELECT a.master_id, a.extra_log_type, a.id
--, a2.extra_log_type, a2.id, mr2.*
FROM activity_log_grit_assignment_followups a
WHERE 
  a.extra_log_type in ('request_pi_followup', 'request_pi_ps_review')
  AND a.id NOT IN (

    SELECT a.id 
    FROM activity_log_grit_assignment_followups a

    LEFT JOIN model_references mr2
    ON
     mr2.from_record_type = 'ActivityLog::GritAssignmentFollowup'
     AND mr2.to_record_type = 'ActivityLog::GritAssignmentFollowup'
     AND mr2.from_record_id = a.id

    LEFT JOIN activity_log_grit_assignment_followups a2
    ON
     mr2.from_record_type = 'ActivityLog::GritAssignmentFollowup'
     AND mr2.to_record_type = 'ActivityLog::GritAssignmentFollowup'
     AND mr2.from_record_id = a.id
     AND mr2.to_record_id = a2.id

    WHERE 
    a.extra_log_type = 'request_pi_followup'
    AND a2.extra_log_type = 'participant_followup'
    AND a2.select_result = 'completed'

    OR
    a.extra_log_type = 'request_pi_ps_review'
    AND a2.extra_log_type = 'pi_ps_review'
  )
/*  
  and a.master_id not in (
    select sa2.master_id 
    from activity_log_grit_assignments sa2
    where extra_log_type in ('exit_ps', 'exit_not_consented', 'ineligible', 'exit_ps_msm', 'completed', 'exit_opt_out', 'exit_l2fu')
    and created_at < (current_date - 14)
  )
*/  
  and a.master_id not in (
    select dsw.master_id 
    from grit_withdrawals dsw
    where 
    select_subject_withdrew_reason = 'withdrew'
    and created_at < (current_date - 14)
  )

associated_reports.name: Completed PI Eligibility Review
associated_reports.description:
### Completed PI Eligibility Review

Lists all participants that meet the following conditions:

- The PI set an eligibility decision in a **Follow Up - PI Phone Screen Review**
- **HMS Phone Screen** has not yet been finalized.

HMS Phone Screen interviewers should follow up with these participants to inform them of their eligibility and if eligible trigger the MSM Phone Screen.
associated_reports.sql:
SELECT a.master_id, a.extra_log_type, a.id
--, a2.extra_log_type, a2.id, mr2.*
FROM activity_log_grit_assignment_followups a
WHERE 
  a.extra_log_type in ('request_pi_ps_review')
  AND a.id IN (

    SELECT a.id 
    FROM activity_log_grit_assignment_followups a

    LEFT JOIN model_references mr2
    ON
     mr2.from_record_type = 'ActivityLog::GritAssignmentFollowup'
     AND mr2.to_record_type = 'ActivityLog::GritAssignmentFollowup'
     AND mr2.from_record_id = a.id

    LEFT JOIN activity_log_grit_assignment_followups a2
    ON
     mr2.from_record_type = 'ActivityLog::GritAssignmentFollowup'
     AND mr2.to_record_type = 'ActivityLog::GritAssignmentFollowup'
     AND mr2.from_record_id = a.id
     AND mr2.to_record_id = a2.id

    WHERE 
    --a.extra_log_type = 'request_pi_followup'
    --AND a2.extra_log_type = 'participant_followup'
    --AND a2.select_result = 'completed'

    --OR
    a.extra_log_type = 'request_pi_ps_review'
    AND a2.extra_log_type = 'pi_ps_review'
  )
  
  and a.master_id not in (
    select saps.master_id 
    from activity_log_grit_assignment_phone_screens saps
    where extra_log_type in ('eligibility_followup', 'finalize')
  )
  
  and a.master_id not in (
    select sa2.master_id 
    from activity_log_grit_assignments sa2
    where extra_log_type in ('exit_ps', 'exit_not_consented', 'exit_ps_msm', 'completed', 'exit_opt_out', 'exit_l2fu')
    --and created_at < (current_date - 14)
  )
  and a.master_id not in (
    select dsw.master_id 
    from grit_withdrawals dsw
    where 
    select_subject_withdrew_reason = 'withdrew'
    --and created_at < (current_date - 14)
  )

associated_message_templates.name: grit ps intro
associated_message_templates.template:
Hello, my name is {{current_user.first_name}} and I’m calling from the 
Football Players Health Study at Harvard University. 
Is Mr. {{player_info.last_name}} available?

*Once on the phone* 

Hi Mr. {{player_info.last_name}}, I am calling because we are working 
with researchers at Morehouse School of Medicine on a new study 
called GRIT, about resilience training as a treatment for 
chronic pain in former professional football players.

I would be happy to tell you more about this study, and if you
are interested, determine if you are eligible.  

Do you have 10 minutes to speak with me right now?

---

**Voicemail**

Hello, my name is {{current_user.first_name}} and I’m calling from 
the Football Players Health Study at Harvard University.
I am calling because we are working with researchers at 
Morehouse School of Medicine on a new study about resilience training as a 
treatment for chronic pain.  I would love to speak with you on the phone 
to discuss whether you are interested and eligible to participate 
in this study.  

When you have a chance please call me back at [{{current_user_contact_info.phone_number}}],
that number again is at [{{current_user_contact_info.phone_number}}]. 
If you would rather reach out through email you can email me 
at Atlanta@footballplayersheath.harvard.edu. Thank you.

associated_message_templates.name: grit ps intro overview
associated_message_templates.template:
**If YES:, study overview –**

Great! Let me tell you a bit more about this study.  
The Football Players Health Study is a comprehensive research program 
based at Harvard University, dedicated to evaluating and improving the 
health and wellbeing of former professional football players. The purpose
of this study is to see if learning resilience skills makes a difference 
in how former players manage chronic pain, and it may advance methods
to improve the well-being and quality of life of former players affected by pain.  

To do this focused study on chronic pain, we are collaborating with one of
our faculty directors – Dr. Herman Taylor – at the Morehouse School of Medicine’s 
Cardiovascular Research Institute in Atlanta, GA. His team at Morehouse 
has previously worked with former NFL players and their families when in 2010 
they initiated “community huddles” in 15 cities across the country to raise
awareness of the difficulties with which players were struggling.  

*Overview of participation*

This study – called GRIT – stands for Goal-Directed Resilience Training.  
Participation in this study requires in-person attendance at Morehouse, 
so we are speaking only with former players who live in the Atlanta area.  
The training sessions are 90 minutes, are held twice per week and last 
for four weeks.  The sessions will take place between 4-6pm on two 
days out of Mondays through Thursdays.

In order for us to test if the resilience training makes a difference in 
managing chronic pain, all eligible former players will begin with a 
testing session before the training.  The testing session will involve 
assessments of chronic pain, physical function, emotional health, 
and other measures.  After testing, everyone will be randomly assigned to 
one of two groups. One group will begin the training, while the other group 
will not do any training for those same 4 weeks. At the end of the 4 weeks, 
both groups will repeat the testing that was done at the beginning. This 
will allow us to see if there was a difference in the group that had the 
training versus the group that did not. The group that did not do the training 
will then go on to complete 4 weeks of training. This group will repeat the 
testing a final time after they complete their training sessions.

If you are eligible and decide to participate after this call, I will ask 
if you are okay with us sharing your contact information with the study 
team at the Morehouse School of Medicine. They will contact you to schedule an 
in-person meeting to review the consent form with you and perform two final 
screening assessments to determine if you are eligible to participate. 
If you are eligible after the final screening assessments, you will also complete 
your first testing session at that time. From then on, all further study 
participation and communications will take place with Morehouse School of Medicine, 
although if you have any questions or concerns you can still contact us at any time. 

Do you have any questions so far?

associated_message_templates.name: grit notification layout
associated_message_templates.template:
GRIT App Message Notification

{{main_content}}
If you received this email in error, please contact fphsetl@hms.harvard.edu to ensure we can update our records appropriately.

associated_message_templates.name: grit eligibility call not eligible
associated_message_templates.template:
The Football Players Health Study at Harvard University appreciates your interest in participating in this study. The study doctors have reviewed the information you have provided and have determined that the in-person assessments study is not a good fit for you. As a reminder, simply because you are not a good fit for this particular study does not mean that you will not have the opportunity to participate in other Football Players Health Study research studies. Do we have permission to contact you in the future?

You will be receiving a gift card for taking the time to answer our questions. Thank you very much for your time.

Confirm contact information and END CALL.

associated_message_templates.name: grit sms notification
associated_message_templates.template: FPHS GRIT notification for {{_subject}}: GRIT ID - {{ids.grit_id}}

associated_message_templates.name: grit notification message
associated_message_templates.template:
{{_subject}}

{{extra_substitutions.reason}}

A new message has been sent from the FPHS GRIT Study App.

Participant GRIT Study ID: {{ids.grit_id}}

{{extra_substitutions.extra_text::markup}}

Please login to Athena to view the request. Click the following link to access the subject record directly:

{{base_url}}/masters/{{master_id}}

associated_config_libraries.name: enabled_if
associated_config_libraries.options:
_definitions:


  any_exit_or_complete: &any_exit_or_complete
    any_exit_or_complete:
      any_exit: &any_exit
        any_tracker_exits: &any_tracker_exit
          activity_log__grit_assignments:
            extra_log_type:
              - exit_ps_msm
              - exit_ps
              - exit_not_consented
              - exit_opt_out
              - exit_l2fu
              - ineligible
              - completed
        any_withdrawal: &any_withdrawal
          dynamic_model__grit_withdrawals:
            no_longer_participating_no_yes: 'yes'
            lost_to_follow_up_no_yes: 'yes'
            select_subject_withdrew_reason: withdrew
            select_investigator_terminated: 
              - yes - due to ae
              - yes - other reason

      all_completed: &all_completed
        activity_log__grit_assignments:
          extra_log_type: completed      

  

  enabled_if: &enabled_if

    # if performed a phone screening no consent to continue, disable after 14 days
    not_all_not_interested:
      any:
        dynamic_model__grit_ps_initial_screenings:
          select_is_good_time_to_speak: not interested
          #select_may_i_begin: not interested
          select_still_interested: 'no'
          still_interested_2_yes_no: 'no'

      all_created_at:
        dynamic_model__grit_ps_initial_screenings:
          created_at:
            condition: <
            value: -14 days

    # if recorded a withdraw activity, disable after 14 days
    not_all_withdraw:
      any_withdrawal: *any_withdrawal
      all_created_at:
        dynamic_model__grit_withdrawals:
          created_at:
            condition: <
            value: -14 days

    # if performed a screening follow up and not eligible, disable after 14 days
    not_all_ineligible:
      dynamic_model__grit_screenings:
        eligible_for_study_blank_yes_no: 'no'
        created_at:
          condition: <
          value: -14 days

    # if performed a screening follow up and not interested in participating, disable after 14 days
    not_all_ps_followup_not_interested:
      dynamic_model__grit_screenings:
        still_interested_blank_yes_no: 'no'
        created_at:
          condition: <
          value: -14 days


    not_all_tracker_exit: 
      activity_log__grit_assignments:
        extra_log_type:
          - exit_ps_msm
          - exit_ps
          - exit_not_consented
          - exit_opt_out
          - exit_l2fu
          - ineligible
          - completed
        created_at:
          condition: <
          value: -14 days
      
      
      
      
  access_defaults: &access_defaults
    showable_if: *enabled_if
    creatable_if: *enabled_if
    editable_if: *enabled_if

associated_config_libraries.name: filestore_container
associated_config_libraries.options:
_definitions:

  ref_filestore_container: &ref_filestore_container
    nfs_store__manage__container: &ref_nfs_store__manage__container
      from: this
      add: one_to_this
      view_as:
        edit: hide
        show: filestore
        new: not_embedded
      creatable_if:
        never: true
        
  save_trigger:
    on_create_filestore_container: &create_filestore_container
      create_filestore_container: 
        name: general files
        label: General Files
        create_with_role: nfs_store group 600



  files_activity: &files_activity
    label: Supporting Files
    fields:
      - notes

    caption_before:
      notes: Describe the files in this container. Individual files can also be given a title and description in the file classifications.

    creatable_if:
      <<: *enabled_if

    editable_if:
      <<: *enabled_if

    save_trigger:
      on_create:
        <<: *create_filestore_container

    references:
      nfs_store__manage__container:
        <<: *ref_nfs_store__manage__container

associated_config_libraries.name: field_options
associated_config_libraries.options:
_defintions:

  field_options: &ps_field_options
  
    possibly_eligible_yes_no: &fo_possibly_eligible_yes_no
      value: 'no'
  
    cbt_how_long_ago: &fo_cbt_how_long_ago
      edit_as: 
        field_type: select_cbt_how_long_ago
        alt_options:
          - more than 5 years ago
          - less than 5 years ago

    sa_severity: &sa_severity
      edit_as: 
        field_type: select_severity
        alt_options:
          - mild
          - moderate
          - severe
          - unsure

    alcohol_frequency:
      edit_as:
        field_type: select_alcohol_frequency
        alt_options:
          Never: 0
          Monthly or less: 1
          2-4 times a month: 2
          2-3 times a week: 3
          4 or more times a week: 4
          
    daily_alcohol:
      edit_as:
        field_type: select_daily_alcohol
        alt_options:
          0, 1 or 2: 0
          3 or 4: 1
          5 or 6: 2
          7, 8 or 9: 3
          10 or more: 4
          
    six_or_more_frequency:
      edit_as:
        field_type: select_six_or_more_frequency
        alt_options:
          Never: 0
          Less than monthly: 1
          Monthly: 2
          Weekly: 3
          Daily or almost daily: 4
          
    select_pain_interfere:
      edit_as:    
        alt_options:
          Never: 1
          Infrequently: 2
          Sometimes: 3
          Frequently: 4
          Always: 5

associated_config_libraries.name: eligibility
associated_config_libraries.options:
_definitions:

  ###################################
  # HMS Phone Screen
  ###################################
  
  gave_consent_to_share: &gave_consent_to_share
    any_gave_consent:
      any_gave_consent_to_share_ineligible:
        dynamic_model__grit_ps_non_eligibles:
          consent_to_pass_info_to_msm_yes_no: 'yes'
          consent_to_pass_info_to_msm_2_yes_no: 'yes'
      any_gave_consent_to_share_possibly_eligible:
        dynamic_model__grit_ps_possibly_eligibles:
           any_questions_yes_no:
             - 'yes'
             - 'no'
#          consent_to_pass_info_to_msm_yes_no: 'yes'
#          consent_to_pass_info_to_msm_2_yes_no: 'yes'
      all_gave_consent_to_share_eligible:
#        dynamic_model__grit_ps_eligibles:
#          consent_to_pass_info_to_msm_yes_no: 'yes'
#          consent_to_pass_info_to_msm_2_yes_no: 'yes'
        dynamic_model__grit_ps_eligibles:
          interested_yes_no: 'yes'
        any:
          dynamic_model__grit_ps_eligibles:
            more_questions_yes_no: 'no'
            select_still_interested: "yes - still interested"

      all_gave_consent_to_share_eligible_followup:
#        dynamic_model__grit_ps_eligibility_followups:
#          consent_to_pass_info_to_msm_yes_no: 'yes'
#          consent_to_pass_info_to_msm_2_yes_no: 'yes'
        dynamic_model__grit_ps_eligibility_followups:
          interested_yes_no: 'yes'
        any:
          dynamic_model__grit_ps_eligibility_followups:
            more_questions_yes_no: 'no'
            select_still_interested: "yes - still interested"
          

  gave_and_understood_consent: &gave_and_understood_consent
    all_gave_and_understood_consent:
      <<: *gave_consent_to_share
      all:
        dynamic_model__grit_ps_screener_responses:
          comm_clearly_in_english_yes_no: 'yes'
          give_informed_consent_yes_no_dont_know: 'yes'


  # HMS Phone Screen - participant eligible and gave consent
  all_eligible_and_gave_consent: &all_eligible_and_gave_consent
    all_eligible_and_gave_consent:
      <<: *gave_consent_to_share
      any_eligible_outcome:
        all_followup_eligible_and_interested:
          dynamic_model__grit_ps_eligibility_followups:
            outcome: eligible
            interested_yes_no: 'yes'
          any:
            dynamic_model__grit_ps_eligibility_followups:
              more_questions_yes_no: 'no'
              select_still_interested: "yes - still interested"
            
        all_eligible_and_interested:
          dynamic_model__grit_ps_screener_responses:
            outcome: eligible
          dynamic_model__grit_ps_eligibles:
            interested_yes_no: 'yes'
          any:
            dynamic_model__grit_ps_eligibles:
              more_questions_yes_no: 'no'
              select_still_interested: "yes - still interested"
            

            
  all_eligible_and_gave_consent_hms_finalized: &all_eligible_and_gave_consent_hms_finalized            
    all_eligible_and_gave_consent_hms_finalized:
      all_finalized:
        activity_log__grit_assignment_phone_screens:
          extra_log_type: finalize

      <<: *all_eligible_and_gave_consent



  any_ineligible: &any_ineligible
    any_ineligible:
      dynamic_model__grit_ps_screener_responses:
        outcome: ineligible
      dynamic_model__grit_ps_eligibility_followups:
        outcome: ineligible


  all_enrolled: &all_enrolled
    all_enrolled:
      activity_log__grit_assignments:
        extra_log_type: appointment

  not_enrolled: &not_enrolled
    not_all_enrolled:
      activity_log__grit_assignments:
        extra_log_type: appointment

associated_config_libraries.name: notification_base
associated_config_libraries.options:
_definitions:


  ####
  # Boilerplace for notifying roles
  # Add role or users attributes
  # Override the subject: and if: structures to refine operation
  ####

  # Default email - just add roles or users
  notify_email_default: &notify_email_default
    type: email
    layout_template: grit notification layout
    content_template: grit notification message
    role: 
    subject: "GRIT Study App: Notification message"
    extra_substitutions:
      reason: ''
      extra_text: ''
      panel_tab: none
      

  # Default SMS - just add roles or users
  notify_sms_default: &notify_sms_default
    type: sms
    layout_template: standard sms layout
    content_template: grit sms notification
    role: 
    subject: "GRIT Study Notification"

associated_config_libraries.name: notify_roles
associated_config_libraries.options:
_definitions:


  ####
  # Boilerplace for notifying roles
  # Directly call in a trigger like:
  #
  # save_trigger:
  #   on_create:
  #     notify: &notify_hms_ps
  #
  ####

  # Creator
  notify_discussion_creator_option: &notify_discussion_creator
    <<: *notify_email_default
    users:
      referring_record:
        user_id: return_value
        
  # Creator SMS
  notify_discussion_creator_option_sms: &notify_discussion_creator_sms
    <<: *notify_sms_default
    users:
      referring_record:
        user_id: return_value


  # HMS Phone Screener
  notify_hms_ps: &notify_hms_ps
    <<: *notify_email_default
    role: email - hms phone screener

  # HMS Phone Screener SMS
  notify_hms_ps_sms: &notify_hms_ps_sms
    <<: *notify_sms_default
    role: sms - hms phone screener

  # MSM Phone Screener
  notify_msm_ps: &notify_msm_ps
    <<: *notify_email_default
    role: email - msm phone screener

  # MSM Phone Screener SMS
  notify_msm_ps_sms: &notify_msm_ps_sms
    <<: *notify_sms_default
    role: sms - msm phone screener


  # PI
  notify_pi: &notify_pi
    <<: *notify_email_default
    role: email - pi

  # PI SMS
  notify_pi_sms: &notify_pi_sms
    <<: *notify_sms_default
    role: sms - pi


  # HMS Admin
  notify_hms_admin: &notify_hms_admin
    <<: *notify_email_default
    role: email - hms admin

  # HMS Admin SMS
  notify_hms_admin_sms: &notify_hms_admin_sms
    <<: *notify_sms_default
    role: sms - hms admin

associated_config_libraries.name: ps_forms_eligibility
associated_config_libraries.options:
_definitions:

  ###################################
  # HMS Phone Screen
  ###################################

  ## Audit C ##
  
  ineligible_fields_audit_c: &ineligible_fields_audit_c
    total_score: 
      - 6
      - 7
      - 8
      - 9
      - 10
      - 11
      - 12

  ineligible_rules_audit_c: &ineligible_rules_audit_c
    any_ineligible_fields_audit_c: *ineligible_fields_audit_c

  ineligible_audit_c: &ineligible_audit_c
    any_ineligible_audit_c:
      dynamic_model__grit_ps_audit_c_questions:
        <<: *ineligible_fields_audit_c
  
  eligible_rules_audit_c: &eligible_rules_audit_c
    not_any_ineligible_fields_audit_c: *ineligible_fields_audit_c
  
  eligible_audit_c: &eligible_audit_c
    not_any_ineligible_audit_c:
      dynamic_model__grit_ps_audit_c_questions: 
        <<: *ineligible_fields_audit_c
        
  
  ## Pain Inquiry ##
  
  ineligible_fields_pain_questions: &ineligible_fields_pain_questions
    select_pain_interfere:
      - 1
      - 2
  
  ineligible_rules_pain_questions: &ineligible_rules_pain_questions
    any_ineligible_fields_pain_questions: *ineligible_fields_pain_questions

  ineligible_pain_questions: &ineligible_pain_questions
    any_ineligible_pain_questions:
      dynamic_model__grit_ps_pain_questions:
        <<: *ineligible_fields_pain_questions
  
  eligible_rules_pain_questions: &eligible_rules_pain_questions
    not_any_ineligible_fields_pain_questions: *ineligible_fields_pain_questions
  
  eligible_pain_questions: &eligible_pain_questions
    not_any_ineligible_pain_questions:
      dynamic_model__grit_ps_pain_questions: 
        <<: *ineligible_fields_pain_questions

  ## Participation ##
  
  ineligible_fields_participation: &ineligible_fields_participation
    commit_to_attend_yes_no: 'no'
    small_group_yes_no: 'no'
    
  ineligible_rules_participation: &ineligible_rules_participation
    any_ineligible_fields_participation: *ineligible_fields_participation

  ineligible_participation: &ineligible_participation
    any_ineligible_participation:
      dynamic_model__grit_ps_participations:
        <<: *ineligible_fields_participation
  
  eligible_rules_participation: &eligible_rules_participation
    not_any_ineligible_fields_participation: *ineligible_fields_participation
  
  eligible_participation: &eligible_participation
    not_any_ineligible_participation:
      dynamic_model__grit_ps_participations: 
        <<: *ineligible_fields_participation

associated_config_libraries.name: secure_notes
associated_config_libraries.options:
####################
# Simple definition to allow add button for secure notes to activities
####################

_definitions:

  al_secure_note_add_button_reference: &al_secure_note_add_button_reference
    dynamic_model__grit_secure_note:
      label: secure note
      from: this
      add: many
      prevent_disable: true


  al_secure_note_embedded_reference: &al_secure_note_embedded_reference
    dynamic_model__grit_secure_note:
      from: this
      add: one_to_this
      prevent_disable: true

associated_config_libraries.name: where_not_exited
associated_config_libraries.options:
and sa.master_id not in (
  select sa2.master_id 
  from activity_log_grit_assignments sa2
  where extra_log_type in (
    'exit_ps', 
    'exit_not_consented', 
    'ineligible', 
    'exit_ps_msm',
    'exit_opt_out', 
    'exit_l2fu',
    'completed'
  )
)
and sa.master_id not in (
  select dsw.master_id 
  from grit_withdrawals dsw
  where 
  select_subject_withdrew_reason = 'withdrew'
)
